name: Nordstrums Treasure
description: For his 18th birthday, the main characters' "landlady", Melissa decided to treat her "tennant" to a vacation on an exotic island. Little did they know, this vacation would change their lives forever. The game is filled with love, lust, and wonder.

name: Beton Brutal
description: Climb a massive overgrown concrete tower while constantly at risk of falling and losing precious progress. Beton Brutal offers a fluid and responsive first person parkour experience through tranquil brutalist architecture.

name: Bloodshell: Conviction
description: A dark psychological Visual Novel. Follow Iris a young girl in her quest to take back her life!

name: The Doorway Effect
description: The Doorway Effect is a 1-4-player co-op psychological horror roguelike. Explore the inner world of a dying man's mind, racing through door after door in a labyrinth of nightmares. Encounter traumas incarnate, and discover the secrets locked within. If you can survive long enough...

name: Hexical
description: Hexical is a retro rogue-like ARPG with a unique physics based combat system. Install modifications that change how you play and fight through hordes of viruses to deliver the 'component' safely.

name: Dystobel
description: Seek the path to your freedom! Join to 84831 (Babel) on her journey to change the way her world is ruled. Dystobel is a metroidvania based on the change of powers with which you can dodge and nullify attacks, with multiple objects to discover and equip.

name: Fragile Feelings
description: A sweet, slow burn yuri / lesbian visual novel about an anxious young teacher being swept off her feet by the cool, competent school nurse.

name: Deck of the Dead
description: "Deck of the Dead" is a thrilling roguelike deckbuilder game set in a dark, mysterious world of vampires. Players will take on the role of a powerful vampire on a quest for ultimate power as they build their deck, defeat enemies, and explore a randomly generated world filled with danger and secrets.

name: Empires Through the Aeons
description: A Massively Multiplayer Grand Strategy game set in medieval Europe. Build up your territories, care for the needs of your Population, forge alliances and lead your house and empire to glory.

name: Short Staffed
description: In Short Staffed you are a server who has been tasked with bringing food to customers in a variety of different restaurants. Toss food across the room and jump over customers in this hectic couch co-op game.

name: Hentai Galaxy
description: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art. And in this art units understand.

name: Not For Broadcast: The Timeloop
description: The nation's first live televised science experiment is going to make you really happy.

name: Sweet Dreams Dahlia
description: An epic 2D hand-drawn metroidvania game, where you explore, fight and survive an ancient mystery land. Dahlia wakes up from her sarcophagus cage without remembering much. She has to find her leading commander and get answers to why the kingdom is left in ruins.

name: Sukebe Beach
description: Break all the blocks and collect the images.

name: Rusp
description: Why play any other boring Shooter When you can Rusp! Rusp is the new Fast Paced Movement Shooter that you were waiting for.

name: Super Laser Fury
description: A third person, bullet hell, future sport shooter where you battle your way through arenas in time trial events, making your way up through the divisions to be crowned the ultimate champion.

name: Parametric Engine
description: Experience the captivating complexity of discrete dynamic systems with Parametric Engine. Easily create and customize your own mathematical systems that reveal intricate and stunning patterns. Personalize your experience with a range of customizable color themes.

name: Language Adventure
description: A stop motion animated language learning adventure game. Aliens have crash landed in your back garden and you must help them return home. Go on an adventure in a handmade town full of colourful characters and learn a new language on the way!

name: The Fall of Aether Station
description: A ruthless tower defense game with a focus on replayability and synergy. Fight increasingly difficult hordes of aliens as you upgrade your ships and adapt to new battlefields. Can you buy humanity enough time to escape?

name: Speed Dates
description: Embark Speed Dates, where you control first dates with 18 attractive women in this interactive FMV game. Shape your story with charm and humor for a personalized romantic journey.

name: Chief Emoji Officer
description: Chief Emoji Officer recreates the absurdities of tech corporations by letting you become CEO using only emojis. Climb your way through corporate America by getting promoted, making allies, avoiding layoffs, and turning Redify into the most successful company in the world.

name: Gods Against Machines
description: You are a god born of necessity. Your world is under attack by a ruthless race of machines, and you are its only hope. Create an arsenal of powerful spells and eliminate the enemy before they irrevocably poison your home in this roguelike strategy game!

name: Pitch Black
description: Wake up in a dungeon of puzzles and monsters, secrets and mysteries... But can you find an escape or exit, help, or even friends?

name: Loom
description: User-friendly, graphical IDE for constructing natural language processing systems/APIs that incorporate modern AI services, including OpenAI's GPT-3 and CoHere AI.

name: String Theory
description: This is a music game where players can compose and improvise. Players will learn some basic musical structures and apply combinations of these musical structures to combat. Defeat enemies with different music styles.

name: Save the World
description: In a world plagued by conflict, greed, and division, hope arrives from beyond the stars. The aliens have come to Earth, and they're listening to everything you say and make it a reality. What will you do with all this sudden power? Will you be able to save the world?

name: Yuki-iro Sign
description: A story of three girls and one season in the snowy town of Minamiouse.

name: Looking for Lokae
description: Find hidden objects and solve puzzles. A pair of rambunctious twins have gotten themselves into trouble, and must now cover up their mistakes before their uncle returns home!

name: Sinful Soul
description: Join a private club where it is possible to fulfill even the most sinful and daring desires. You can forget about modesty and decency in this place. Here your choice matters. Will you dare to begin the life you've always dreamed of?

name: The Magical Land of Canada
description: Our heroes must travel to Canada and are surprised to find out it's a real place and not fictional.

name: Good Luck Baby!
description: An out of this world yuri visual novel about falling in love, defeating an evil Empress, and finding a magic baby on your crush’s doorstep.

name: Citadel Anew
description: Citadel Anew is a first-person base-building experience. Collect resources, construct infrastructure and manage your colonists. Research new technologies and manufacture new weapons to help you in your fight against the enemy.

name: Devil Hunters
description: Together with your friends, defeat the swarming monsters! Collect gems, and unlock more runes through accumulated honor to enhance the fighting power of heroes! The level boss will appear in 15 minutes, hurry up to let the hero grow up and defeat it!

name: CrashOut Xtreme
description: Crashout Xtreme is a casual arcade game with a unique combination of Pong and Brickout gameplay. Break the blocks using the bat and ball with a new and fresh design. Various gameplay experiences await with power-ups, and so the challenging enemies.

name: Battle of Hořice 1423
description: Relax alone or with friends while experiencing the 15th-century battle and all that came with it - explained simply and casually in a popular way.

name: Goblin Keep
description: Voxel World Survival and Town Building game with building tools, combat, and destruction

name: Fuzz
description: Fly through a land of whimsical nature and lost technology, engage in fluid aerial combat, and use the world around you to unlock new areas and conquer new challenges.

name: Bent Oak Island
description: Bent Oak Island is a 1990's point and click adventure set on a mysterious island! Join twins Archer and Sam as they delve into the mysteries of both the island and their own heritage, and maybe save the world!

name: The Cursewood
description: A fantastical action-adventure game. Explore the forest, craft dozens of unique potions, and survive the dangers of the night!

name: Muscle MILF
description: Physical labor is a tough gig but it can be very rewarding, especially when you can log some overtime hours with your buff busty boss as she begs to be bred!

name: BRoS: Battle Royale of Survival
description: Fight against other survivors and watch the time to escape from the island. Jump into the battle royale experience and try to survive. To increase your chance of survival, arm yourself and show no mercy. Chaos reigns on the island and only one survives or no one. Be a survivor!

name: Pip: Battle for the Arctic
description: A cute, fun platformer for all ages. Travel though the arctic, caves and ocean. Eat fish along the way, and make your way to the factory. Play as Pip, or Owl, and take back the arctic from the evil oil drilling company's CEO!!

name: Survive Now
description: In this thrilling top-down roguelite survival game, you'll face off against hordes of creatures in a desperate battle for survival. You'll need to collect energy to unlock new skills and upgrade existing ones, and every moment counts as you fight your way through waves of monsters.

name: Adrenaline Dungeon
description: Adrenaline Dungeon is a top-down dungeon crawler game, play as an unknown man stuck in a time-looped dungeon. Uncover clues to discover a new order trying to rewrite history. Use different weapons and abilities to escape the dungeon and prevent history from being rewritten.

name: Cantirium: God Slayer
description: A colorful metroidvania made in pixel art, where we have to help a cat girl save the whole world from inevitable death, and at the same time challenge the gods themselves!

name: A Vøid
description: "A Vøid" is a 3D bullet-hell action game. You can enjoy the tension of just barely avoiding a barrage of bullets, the exhilaration of striking a powerful blow with a magic fist that becomes stronger the more you avoid it.

name: Tap Sword
description: Be the best blacksmith!

name: Ninja Otedama R
description: A funny party game in which you launch ninjas like a cue ball and carry them so that they don't drop.

name: Kakuriyo Village: Moratorium of Adolescence
description: Ao & Hinori were both childhood sweethearts and accidentally went to a strange world called Kakuriyo Village. Because of her boyish appearance, the villagers mistakenly thought Hinori was a boy... Can they successfully hide Hinori's genders and escape from the village!?

name: The Witch's Cauldron
description: The Witch's Cauldron is a narrative roguelike game about being a medieval witch. Grab your cauldron and get brewing. Love, curses, laughter, wisdom for sale! Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law. At least before the inquisitors come around.

name: I am Jesus Christ: Christ's Revenge
description: Jesus Christ is back... For vengeance. Pray, Fight, and Loot your way to righteous glory. Make your daddy proud and smite all the heretics.

name: Alice in Dreamland
description: "Alice Minase" was just a regular office worker. One evening when she came home from work... A book about a "Wonderland" falls off from the shelf. Then, she stumbled into the "Wonderland".

name: King War
description: Who can be the last king in the dogfight between the countries of the earth and aliens? A pixel-style real-time strategy game, a simple and easy experience for placing units

name: System Critical 2
description: System Critical 2 is bigger & badder than ever before! Get ready to experience a platformer shooter like no other in VR. Blast your arm cannon and use guns, melee weapons, grenades,& shields to make your way through the carefully crafted levels with epic boss battles and tons of enemies to kill.

name: Dunjunguy
description: Dunjunguy is a randomly generated action RPG dungeon-crawler with Rogue-like elements. Following brave adventurers on their journey into the DUNJUN players will find bizarre unique items, epic loot, and pets that buff the player's abilities and enable them to fight off the endless hordes of creatures.

name: Hot Pussy College 2
description: Hot Pussy College 2 is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of college life. The game is packed with humor, romance, and lots of sex. Play as a young male attending college at B&R and guide him through the experience.

name: Ballistic: The story of Marble and the Energy Core
description: Ballistic is a top-down roguelike casual game divided by level, with a completely new take on the gameplay invented by Breakout in 1976, and enhance later by other games like Arkanoid.

name: Silentium: Remastered
description: Silentium: Remastered is a sci-fi action platformer game placed in a distant future, where two factions are locked in an endless war for control over the galaxy's many planetary systems. Supporting up to 4 local players, engage in PVP or PVE Action across a wide range of diverse environments.

name: Milkshake!
description: Milkshake! - a clicker with a lot of beautiful girls! You must collect all the girls, for this you need to bring them to the peak with your clicks! Each girl is animated, voiced and emotional!

name: Celestiais & Dragões
description: The new 2D Hack and slash based on fantasy medieval times using mechanics inspired by old Beat 'em ups phases games from the Arcade era. It has a lot of adventure, action, magic, mystery, sensational environments and diverse creatures. Try to beat the game and decipher this story.

name: Go There
description: A short action game that the girl go "There" with a dragon.

name: Running Riot
description: Pick a class and blast your way through rooms of cyber enemies in this roguelite twin-stick shooter! Choose your abilities and your path wisely, because you've only got one life to make it through the gauntlet. Rack up those points and spend them on even more ways to RIOT!

name: Glory to the Heroes
description: Glory to the Heroes set in the Russian-Ukrainian war is a tactical first-person shooter with an immersive experience and massive multiplayer full-scale battles involving many kinds of different military units and vehicles, where the action is happening in the real-world locations of actual battles.

name: Gift
description: When the protagonist wakes up, he finds himself on a luxury cruise ship. The game revolves around the story of his attempts to escape from the sinking ship and a group of passengers he feels nostalgic about.

name: Cryspace
description: Cryspace is a fresh social media simulator/visual novel with a heavy focus on relationships, dating, and multiple branching paths. Create your profile, connect with friends, and find your way to success, or stumble into despair.

name: Pop Some Eyes
description: Pop Some Eyes is a FPS game where you control Mr. Pineapple Bundy, in a space jail where he must fight aliens to survive. The game features fast-paced action, unique sci-fi/comedy storyline, and 3 different weapons. Help Mr. Pineapple navigate the dangers of the space jail and defeat alien forces.

name: AgrChamp
description: Are you ready for the hardest exam of your life? If yes, let me welcome you to the game AgrChamp. It is a game based on elements of the famous game Jump King and it’s motivated into environment of the famous czech streamer Agraelus.

name: The End: Pronton
description: The chaotic Earth has barely regained stability, but meets a force called Poroton beyond the universe...

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: France
description: Discover the sights of France while playing fun jigsaw puzzles!

name: Astro Pig
description: A 90-s inspired lo-fi adventure puzzle platformer about a piglet astronaut and his intelligent ship.

name: Pino the Elemental
description: Adventure game in hack slash style, with different spells and pets, enemies with different difficulties, high difficulty level against bosses.

name: Ringlorn Saga Gaiden
description: Ringlorn Saga Gaiden is an adventure RPG inspired by the Japanese PC classics. After dying in a decisive battle, your spirit is separated from your body, and you must exact your revenge on the Dark Lord by possessing his minions.

name: Jetpack Birdie
description: Jetpack Birdie is a third-person shooter, that lets you fly on a jetpack with no limitations. Be a whirlwind - charge through Cloud City and free it of bandit oppression!

name: Reclusive
description: Robert Livingston sails to a remote northern island to spend the last days of his life on it and encounters unexplained phenomena and creatures.

name: Avia Corporation
description: Buy planes, set prices, calculate the budget, track the passenger flow of each city, create routes for the whole world, build your ideal airline

name: Changer Seven
description: Fast-Paced Lane-Based Action Brawler. The legendary Changers 7 heroes must fight a new threat that changes the citizens of Sunny Point into terrifying beings! But as they investigate and defeat "villain of the week" like enemies, they suspect that someone from their own group may be behind it all.

name: Secrets of the Witch House
description: Secrets of the Witch House is a challenging, procedurally generated, permadeath, action roguelike. Encounter fierce monsters, dark secrets, devastating weapons and pachinko as you wage war against an ancient evil.

name: The Druid
description: We embody the spirit of The Dagda, king of the Celtic gods, with the objective of liberating his territory from the corruption of the goddess Morrigan in a 2D roguelike platformer full of intensity.

name: Apostate
description: Battle against the horrors of a rogue wizard cult after being labeled an Apostate. In this top down, action roguelite, choose from a vast selection of spells, augmentations, items, and stats to create your own unique custom hero. Discover synergies and unlock builds as you compete against your foes.

name: Fish Simulator: Agonik Lake
description: In this simulation game, play the role of a proud northern pike (Esox lucius) living in a North American lake. Your goal: Surviving and becoming the King of Agonik Lake! To achieve this feat, feed yourself; get stronger, taller, faster; and avoid various hazards along the way.

name: Which Way Up: Galaxy Games
description:
Which Way Up: Galaxy Games is a family friendly party game that gives unique freedom of movement by allowing you to run on walls and ceilings, orbit around planets, or fall across entire levels by manoeuvring through gravity fields.

Before The Universe existed, the Space Sprites banded together one-by-one to see a dream come to fruition: the dream of life itself. As The Universe began to take shape, so too did space. But space is unpredictable, and creating life is tiresome work. So, the Sprites took it upon themselves to create a pastime. The Galaxy Games.

Each event features its own unique bite-sized challenge where up to 4 players can compete. Eject your friends into space as you race across gravity fields, score a goal with an entire moon, leap across planets to escape a black hole, and capture and hold zodiacal constellations.

name: Fall of Gods
description: Hack and slash your way through the ancient gods of Egypt in this action-packed rogue-lite developed by a team of two. Explore randomly generated dungeons, unlock powerful abilities and obliterate your enemies with devastating combos!

name: Uootoy 3671
description: The legendary comic action puzzle "Uootoy" from 1984 is now available in its ultimate version with all the elements enhanced! The combination of various simple tricks is easy for anyone to understand, and the various stages that stimulate your creativity will keep you hooked!

name: Grey Area
description: A tough platformer following an 8-year-old diving over, under, and around the terrifying creatures living in a strange, mysterious world that's so much bigger than her: the "world between all worlds".

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Flowers
description: Escape to stunning floral landscapes

name: Royal Romances: Forbidden Magic - Collector's Edition
description: Is it possible to overcome obstacles through hope or faith in love? Lead your valiant heroes through the thorny path to their most cherished desires and find out!

name: Insurgence: Chains of Renegade - Remastered
description: Insurgence is a 2D Role Playing Game with Visual Novel elements, Enjoy the classic RPG experience and discover the meaning of redemption and friendship within the Insurgence movement.

name: OliVR
description: Step into a Greek Mythology Inspired Story Rich VR Rhythm Game designed with comfort and relaxation in mind, encounter new friends and fight godlike foes with VR rhythm action all while exploring a gorgeous digital landscape!

name: For The Freedom!
description: Become a medieval gladiator in roguelike deckbuilder game! Build your own deck and tactics to beat dangerous enemies! Get, upgrade and discover new cards. Explore next arenas and climb the hierarchy. Fight for freedom!

name: Dysmantle: Doomsday
description: Board a mysterious flying cargo drone and enter a hidden archipelago holding a deadly secret. Discover scientific experiments gone awry and utilize new technologies to stave off doomsday.

name: Nusantara
description: The hackable indie turn-based strategy game. The game is feature-rich, with single (PvE) and multiplayer (PvP) content. Different maps, factions, heroes, upgrade trees and randomized map interaction allow for lots of exploration, while rulesets allow for endless replayability. Minigame included!

name: Fury
description: Online first- and third-person shooter in which players fight in different parts of the world against military forces and armies.

name: Restart
description: A scientist with great knowledge about humanity ends up back in the Stone Age and has to build a civilization and develop it into the modern age.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Birds
description: Get ready to spread your wings and soar through a world of stunning avian beauty.

name: Plateman
description: Explore the steampunk world in Plateman. Fly over the world of machines full of gimmicks and monsters. Uncover the secrets of Shaman and the difference engine. Try to change this decaying world by Shaman Drum and the special lightning power.

name: Void Nomads
description: Void Nomads is a solo action-shooter RPG set in a sci-fi universe where those who once set out for outer space can never return to inhabited planets. Scavenge for technology in derelict ancient alien ships. Explore small outposts and massive corporate stations. Take risks and survive in the void.

name: Forbidden City Journey
description: This is a VR tour game based on the real picture, which can not only allows players to immerse themselves in the majesty of the Forbidden City, but also to understand the culture and history of the Forbidden City through a mini-game.

name: Hold-Up
description: Prepare the perfect heist. Do record the plan progress, rewind, replan, proceed quietly, lockpick, hide in the dark, take the loot and then run away!

name: Rabbi-T
description: Save Wilson Toys Inc. from the villainous robot ACTO and be a hero. Rabbi-T is a 2D running action game that pursues destruction and speed. Destroy obstacles to run faster. Reach the boss's weakness as fast as possible.

name: Medchess
description: Build and manage your own medieval village while maintaining the balance between gold, army, technology, and faith. Will you survive the bandits and pollution in Medchess?

name: Girls Tennis League
description: The Steam version of the popular 3D independent tennis game "Girls Tennis League" is now online! Real tennis action, supports up to 4 players local doubles and online match, fully supports controller operation, permanent update, and many functions waiting for you to experience.

name: Lamia's Bambina
description: Lamia's Bambina is a unique game centered around the trials of the Lamia tribe. Reclaim stolen territory from the rival Harpy tribe by training, forming formidable parties, and facing off in battle. The fate of the Lamias lies with you. Unite, Lamia's Bambina!

name: Monster Bar
description: The monsters who have been bullied by the human empire for tens of thousands of years have finally joined forces to resist. This starts with the legendary demon king... Don't get me wrong, you are just a little monster doing miscellaneous work. Clean the floor first.

name: Weggye's Adventures
description: Weggye's Adventures is a 2D platformer game. Which focuses on skill. The player explores a magical world full of challenges with Weggye.

name: Red Crucible: Phoenix Rising
description: No prisoners! No mercy! Smash and destroy your way to victory!

name: Silent Nights
description: Silent Nights - A short horror game with realistic graphics, touching storyline and scary moments.

name: Merchant in Dungeon
description: This is a Shop Management RPG game. pay off his huge debts and get rid of his engagement to an ugly girl, Heracles came to the Devil's reign to make money! The city is not only not as scary as it is said to be, but also full of beautiful girls?! A year-long trip to make money begins... ...

name: Tranquil Isle
description: Tranquil Isle is a rogue-lite city-builder in which the player must build up their town by progressing through a research tree while balancing 4 resources, Population, Science, Industry, and Happiness.

name: Make Them Stop
description: This time it's too much! Make Them Stop is a game where you must manage the organization of a strike by blocking vehicles. Choose your cause, get organized, and make your voice heard. Be careful not to get run over!

name: Hullbreakers
description: Hullbreakers is a space arcade game with fast paced combat, quick maneuvering, and strategy. Use an ever-evolving spacecraft to wipe out endless hordes of enemies and relentless bosses in order to make your mark on the leaderboard.

name: Extreme Tag!
description: Extreme Tag! is a casual party game for all! Run from tagged players to stay alive. Last one standing wins!

name: The Little Witch Shop: New in Town
description: In this shop management game, acquire new familiars to help cultivate your greenhouse, hunt fantastical creatures, and craft potions or runes to fulfill customer orders. Earn gold to upgrade your magic shop and impress the Witches’ Council.

name: Smells Like a Mushroom
description: The Milky Way has become infested with creatures called Magic Mushrooms. To prevent a catastrophe, the brave Carrotado goes into space! Third-person sci-fi shooter with a bizarre story for a single-player and co-op.

name: Beacon's Bluff
description: Solve unearthly puzzles and become engrossed in this discerning horror mystery story. The Lighthouse is the first in the Story Machine Horror series.

name: Hank Loves the Beach
description: You play as Hank, a drooling stray cat, who loves the beach. And cheeseburgers! Life would be perfect if he finally found his one true love. After setting paw on Stabby Island, our little chonky boy disrupts the established order of the beach. Can he stuff his belly without consequences?

name: Dying Breed
description: Dying Breed is a classic base building RTS game, set in a past alternative timeline, featuring 2 unique faction with a common enemy.

name: Lost Dream: Darkness
description: Once the Darkness rises above all, It's your time to take the reins and hit the ground running on a mission to discover the light once again.

name: The Hellchemist
description: The Hellchemist is an intense pve arena shooter where you will fight waves of monsters while random events will alter the way you have to play the game and makes every run unique. The game is heavily inspired by Doom and Quake. Bunny hops, shooting and a whole lot of explosions!

name: Echoes of Somewhere: Series 1
description: Echoes of Somewhere is a free adventure anthology game series. Each episode in the series is about 1-4 hours of classic point-and-click gameplay in a new setting with new characters and different stories. The episodes can be finished in any order.

name: Seizure of Territories
description: Enemy tanks have surrounded you and are trying to destroy everyone. But you have a tank at your disposal, ready to help expel the enemy. You will have to focus all your strategic skills, anticipate and stay ahead of enemy moves and capture enemy bases.

name: Spell Disk
description: Build unique synergy spell combos to destroy the hordes of monsters and bosses in this rogue-lite action game.

name: Aqua Marbles: Ocean
description: Deep in the abyss of the ocean lies an underwater kingdom. Dive into a submarine atmosphere complete with colorful graphics and exciting music, but keep an eye out! In the deepest darkest corners lie sunken ships and castles full of danger. Check out match-3 from a fresh perspective!

name: Insurgence: Second Assault - Remastered
description: Insurgence - Second Assault is a follow-up sequel to Insurgence - Chains of Renegade. Features new characters and stories from two different points of view.

name: Ettrian: The Elf Prince
description: Unravel the truth behind betrayal and reclaim your rightful place in Ettrian - The Elf Prince, an epic adventure of survival and redemption!

name: Access Denied: Escape
description: Access Denied: Escape is a puzzle game where you have to hack data vaults and interact with various devices to escape.

name: ArrowMongers
description: ArrowMongers is a top-down, pixel art, 2D shooter roguelite!... Or actually more than that!? Fight through the procedural dungeon, clear the floors of the colosseum, solve the puzzles in the puzzles dungeon, and become a legendary archer in the ArrowMongers village!

name: My Summer Adventure: Memories of Another Life - Day 1
description: A strange incident turns the life of an ordinary young man upside down when, having fallen asleep on a regular train commute, he wakes up in another country... in a body of a Japanese student! An unforgettable summer adventure awaits, promising many fateful meetings and momentous occasions.

name: Shaper
description: Shaper is an integrated 2D dungeon editor allowing you to create your own adventure. Create a dungeon with enemies, objects, decorations and share it with your friends and the community!

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: On the Farm
description: Join us on a journey to the countryside and indulge in the joyful and peaceful world of farming

name: Goospace
description: Goospace is a side-scroller jump game. discover universe, jump through physics from planets to planets, find various birds and fresh turnips.

name: Dethroned
description: Unleash your inner ruler in Dethroned - an army-building roguelike with short runs, tactical but dynamic fights and infinite possibilities. Choose a mage, hone unique abilities, hunt for spells and artifacts. Explore an unpredictable world, grow influence and forge alliances to reclaim the throne.

name: Dungeon Slave
description: This is a Dungeon themed Hack and Slash, adventure through the dungeon and defeat all enemies and bosses, level up characters and create a variety of combos

name: Xanthiom Zero
description: Play as Captain Grisham, as he uncovers the secrets of Planet Zord in this thrilling prequel to Side Scape!

name: Super Cakeboy
description: When a group of unsanitary chefs threaten all that is good and just in Cakeland, it's up to Cakeboy to serve up punishment. Fight your foes with pastry-themed items in this bite-sized 2D platforming adventure!

name: Rugby Sevens 23
description: Get ready to experience the intensity and excitement of rugby 7s like never before with our new game! In this retro-inspired 2D action game, you'll take on the role of a rugby player and lead your team to victory in a full career mode, complete with team building, trading of players, and more.

name: Tamayura Mirai
description: There is a girl, searching for something she lost... Tamayura Mirai is a midsummer fantasy visual novel of humans, spirits, and sorcerers that's won several industry awards in Japan.

name: Alpacalypse
description: Alpacalypse is a 2.5D action platformer where you control Pancake The Llama, fighting to rescue your wife, The Mrs. Kick and spit your way through hordes of alpacas, collecting coins, and platforming your way to victory.

name: Beaming Stingray
description: Experience Soraya's journey to return a captured deity in this approachable and fluid shoot 'em up. Shoot, dash, dodge, and rewind as you fight for the future by saving the past...

name: Liber 2: Lost in time
description: Alex woke up on a desert island and he has to find out where and in what century the book of ancient civilization brought him this time. Desperately not broken, the main character is looking for a way to return home, but acquires much more and finds his destiny.

name: Adventure Apple Robots
description: Help the hero to find out why his brother is always running away, explore this fantastic world and unlock new skills as he ventures.

name: Crazy Cars
description: Crazy Cars is an action-packed racing game that combines fast-paced gameplay with vehicular combat. Players race in custom vehicles, use power-ups & special abilities, and enjoy endless hours of excitement. Multiple game modes, customizations, & suitable for all ages.

name: Juruna
description: In a forest the rabbit was being enslaved by the Magic fox. On a certain day Juruna's daughter is taken along with other rabbits. Juruna Even though he is more fragile, he decides to go on a mission to face his enemy and try to recover his daughter and the other rabbits.

name: Galactic Getaway
description: Explore a cozy, uncharted planet and make it your own in this wholesome multiplayer life-sim! Befriend creatures to gather rare resources and build your dream home. Play fun minigames, farm crops, and craft decorations as you shape your perfect slice of galactic paradise!

name: Dinobot and Tiara Present: ApplePop
description: Apple Pop is a super relaxing, super satisfying Puzzle Popper with powerups, beautiful scenery and major combo's for literally anyone to play to pass the time or to let off some stress.

name: TileDeck TD
description: TileDeck TD is a Deckbuilding Tower Defense with roguelike elements set in a tabletop environment. Expand your kingdom, play powerful cards and build your perfect defensive setup.

name: Fantasy Boy
description: Fantasy Boy: a roguelike, following the adventure of Boy. Explore a fantasy world, fight many enemies, and have FUN!

name: Old Forest Ranch
description: Defend your farm from evil scarecrows in Old Forest Ranch, a thrilling blend of farming simulation and action gameplay. Plant crops, complete jobs, and use a variety of weapons to defeat waves of Scarecrows to save the forest.

name: Fractured Light
description: Fractured Light is a movement-focused roguelike shooter where you grapple, slide, wall run, and rocket jump your way through a procedurally generated space station.

name: The Aching
description: In a dark world somewhere between dream and nightmare you find yourself alone, cold, and without memory of who you are or where you came from. Guided by little more than a silver locket and questions, you must find your way off an isolated island in pursuit of answers.

name: Help Me Fly
description: Propeller Joe's plane ran out of power again, and it's up to you to help him jump-start it through 90 brain teasing levels.

name: Pwnz!
description: Pwnz! a hybrid board/card game. Don’t just trust your luck. Use tactics. Plan your moves. Climb the ranks. Be the best!

name: Shape Garden
description:
You're an explorer in a strange landscape of beautiful and ethereal computer generated shapes. Play is simple. Just swipe to move shapes. When shapes collide they merge to form new higher level shapes with higher point values. A new shape is added after each move.
The game's over when there's no free spaces and no shapes can be merged. But don’t worry, there’s always next time with a completely new wondrous set of randomly generated shapes.

name: Sharp Minds
description: Solve unique and challenging puzzles by adding numbers! How difficult can addition up to ten or twenty be? Find out in this fun puzzle game which really drains your mental energy completely.

name: Clumsy Fish
description: Tap your fins to swim. Manoeuvre the clumsy fish among obstacles and keep it alive for as long as you can. Will you defeat the coral reef or will it defeat you?

name: Machinaero
description: Invent and build any machine that you can imagine, from simple gliders to complex spacecrafts, and use them to explore the world by air, land, and water! Overcome obstacles like blowing winds, rough seas, dark caves, wild jungles, hot deserts, and freezing mountains to finally reach the infinite space. Boldly go, where no man has gone before - the only limit is your imagination!

name: Spectrum 6
description: Mixing colors and assigning it to a certain place made the Spectrum6 a challenging yet fun experience. From combining 2 primary colors such as Red, Yellow and Blue, you can create any secondary colors like Orange, Green or Violet. A neutral color Black can also be created by combining all the primary colors.

name: Bombs Away on Barrels
description:
Bombs Away on Barrels is a high velocity tilting and tapping game. Wonderful 40+ addicting puzzles have you speeding your reckless bomb through exploding barrels to save the castle. Download it now!
Multiple levels and unique objects to beat the game. Run through time warps, bouncy springs and use an unlimited amount of turbo firework boosts. Amazing and fun game for all ages in high definition with real physics and amazing graphics.
Use trajectory and gravity to roll your way into the finals with Bombs Away on Barrels.

name: Golden Tee Golf
description:
Golden Tee Golf, the pop culture phenomenon that has been played by more than 20 million players over the past three decades, can now be played in the palm of your hand.
Whether you crave a relaxing trip through the front 9 or a teeth-grinding challenge on windy bluffs, Golden Tee Golf has it all. The contests for big prizes. The diverse equipment customization options. The varied and quirky clothing choices. The intricate, white-knuckled course design. The trademark game play that allows you total control. Make shots as quick and smooth as buttered lightning.

name: Soccer Academy Simulator
description:
Soccer Academy: make a business on education and training of soccer players!
If you do not like how your favourite soccer team participates in tournaments, if you constantly criticises the actions and physical form of players so Soccer Academy Simulator is created especially for you. In your hands is a real soccer academy, where you can train and teach the players.

name: Can Your Pet 2: Returns
description: Can Your Pet? is Cute Chick twist ending game. Your cute pet is waiting for you.

name: Chess Battle Quest
description: Learn Chess the fun and easy way through unique challenges throughout the campaign. Beginners and Youngsters alike will enjoy this game a lot. Chess Pieces follows the movement rules of traditional chess but capturing a piece may need several attacks where in each pieces have their own stats.

name: Cafe Battle
description: Café Battle is a cute, but exciting game for 2 players. In this game, there are two adorable witches who want to own their Café. Your tasks are to align with the cute witches, battle your friends & family, and acquire customers as many as possible to win! Swipe your finger to hurl magic balls and leverage 10 unique magic spells to battle your friends & family and to acquire more customers! Adorable roles, exciting battles, and 2 player mode are the three reasons you should play it with your friends & family now!

name: Micro Battles 3
description:
Whoop your friends in head to head battles, 8-bit style!
Picking up where the glorious 2-player based video games of the 1970-1980s left off, it's time to bring back snakes, cars, robots and samurais to once again settle the score between players.

name: Hyper One: Space R.E.M.
description:
Hyper One is a survival journey of a spaceship in the interstellar which occurs few light-years post the diminishing of the star systems across the universe in various galaxies due to unreasonable events. The last living galactic race is trying to survive the rest of their lives on survival spaceships.
Gather! Evade! Escape! and Survive!! in this faster than light travel concept game involving hyper jumps and hyperspace.
The spaceships are light year technology capable of maneuvering and mining around the asteroid fields easily with the help of space R.E.M. (Space Remnant Evasive Maneuvering). Using this HUD technology and tilt controls get a realistic simulation while maneuvering the spaceship through the asteroids.
These spaceships travel from a star system to another in search of any dying planet to gather resources from its space remnants before it is completely destroyed due to dark matter forces. The spaceship needs to orbit the remnants of the planet to gather as many resources as possible and escape before its destruction.
This survival event Hyper ONE: Space Remnant Evasive Maneuvering is a procedurally generated never-ending journey beyond the infinity.

name: Baseball Kings 2015
description:
Get your pro baseball league stars in shape so that they can play at best like a allstar players.
You can also raise batting average and improve the ball’s speed up to 110MPH !
Work hard and build yourself an unbeatable derby team.
Battle your team to World Series Champion !

name: Snow Cone Tycoon
description: Snow Cone Tycoon is a fun and educational game for all ages! Players start their journey with a block of ice, a few paper cones, and some flavored syrup. With each new day, players attempt to build their fan base by making the best snow cones on the block! But, earning the rank of Tycoon won’t be easy. With ever-changing (and sometimes disastrous) weather conditions, players must adjust their recipe, manage their resources, and strategize.

name: Avoids
description:
The one who Avoids survives!
Put your reflexes to the test in this fast and furious shuffle puck dodging game with up to 8 players or fingers simultaneously on the same device!
Activate colours to play with a finger, or two, or more! How many can you manage at the same time without being hit or lifting a finger?
Hold your breath as you grab the light coins and shields but avoid the dark forces and never lift your finger or you're out!
The faster your reflexes the longer you survive to claim your cash and time crowns!

name: Stick Knight
description: Stick Knight is an exciting and fast paced speed runner. You must race through the levels collecting items. Defeating cunning enemies. Solving puzzles map before the clock runs out. Jump and action at the right time to avoid your death.

name: Pathz
description: Pathz is an immersive puzzle game that incorporates unique storytelling and ambient music to create a relaxing and enjoyable experience. Best over a hundred roads to uncover the story of the path - from the laughably simple to the satisfyingly complex. Overcome unique obstacles on your travels: Falling tiles, moving floors, shifting terrain and many others. Sit back and unwind to the tranquil Classic theme, or spice things up with the funky and upbeat Juicy theme.

name: Paint Fruit Crush
description: Paint Fruit Crush, a lovely game, the rule is simple, easy to control, gently moving your fingers, connect the lovely fruits.

name: My Love Match
description: Test your reaction and agility in this cute matching game, featuring two different and addictive love themed modes. Use angelic power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: Neko Atsume: Kitty Collector+
description: Attract cats with food and then watch them romp with your toys! More than 40 varieties of cats—white and black, tabby and calico—might stop by. Rare cats are rumored to roam the neighborhood too, but you'll need particular items to entice those elusive felines. Each visitor is logged in your Catbook. Become a master kitty collector and fill it up! You can even make albums of your cat photos, or save them to your device and use them as wallpaper!

name: Swing Racers
description:
Swing Racers is a 3D racing game with unique controls - swing your car around the house with a rubber band - the further you pull, the faster you go but the harder it becomes!

Swing and fling your way through 15 tracks in your favourite household environments, including messy bedrooms, dinner tables, kitchen sinks, pool tables, gardens and more! Bonus levels included for some extra non-racing fun!

Burn your opponents with a fireball or freeze them and smash them to pieces! Zap them with lightning, or leave trails of sticky goo and slippery oil for them to drive into!

Unlock new cars and new rubber bands to enhance your speed and handling + cool paint jobs just for the looks!

name: Cosmo-s
description:
Just rotate the object with a tap so that the light can reach the goal.
Be careful as the object does not rotate when light starts.
Predict where the light will go and let it go to the goal!

name: Merge Tales
description:
Merge Tales, match 3 and merge dragons, heal the land, solve puzzle games and dress up your dragon city, build your own special world.
In Merge Gardens, there are countless possibilities waiting to be discovered, and new things are constantly being discovered as the surrounding lands are unlocked and expanded.
Magical things happen when the same things are matched together, they merge into higher-level and more magical items. You need some strategy to merge more advanced items with minimal items.

name: RC Heli 3
description:
Enjoy flying Micro RC helicopters and quads around a very detailed 3d scenario.
Scale up your skills with 4 physics simulation difficulty modes ranging from a strongly electronically assisted "Beginner" mode to an ultra realistic "Pro" mode.
RC Heli 3 engine simulates RC Helis and Drones very realistically allowing you to learn and practice as a simulator but it can also turn into a more arcade and easy experience.
The new Ai assisted Follow camera ads incredible realism to the experience following your vehicle as if you where there.
2 Race game modes will see you flying micro quads trough cardboard checkpoints scattered through the realistic scenario, and compete online on our global leaderboards.
Join the competition to be the King of the Week and be one of the 3 usernames on the whiteboard on all players main menus. Each week the competition will be reset and a new king will take power!

name: OK! Bird: Wing Up
description: Let’s feel the fantastic world with your birds ! There are item boxes in the game, you can get ‘Star’ and ‘Quick Dog’ from the boxes.

name: Kheshig Treasure Empires Fight
description:
A game that introduces the player to action-packed mission that comes with great fun by defeating enemies which is absolutely worth trying!
This fantastic war game which is based on Kheshig who acted as bodyguards in the Mongol Empire and were trained to offer protection particularly to different rulers such as Genghis Khan together with his wife Börte. They also acted as imperial guards for emperors and the royal family. Your mission is to keep safe the treasure.
As a player of this action game, one is assigned a mission to undertake; that is to conquer the world using the available knight warriors. The game comes with a challenging experience where the player is required to guard the treasure and keep away the enemies by bombing them. The warrior clash continues until you conquer them.
This is a multiplayer game where you can play against your device or against your friends online. Enjoy your time by leading a virtual war.
You will defend your treasure with your warriors. And your bomb can defeat your enemy.
You can play as Mongolian Warrior, Egypt Warrior, Mayan Warrior, Ninja Warrior, Arctic Warrior or Cowboy.

name: CrimeTrip
description:
CrimeTrip is a true crime adventure game in augmented reality from Prologue XR studio.
The objective of the game is to solve unsolved cold cases by exploring and investigating the crime scenes in augmented reality. The game features 6 real-life crimes, all of which are based on clever and notorious cases from the 70s and 80s. Players will have to analyze evidence and clues to solve the crimes, and as they progress, the game becomes more immersive and surreal, with captivating content and an atmospheric police station.
Take on the role of a True Crime fan in charge of investigating 6 mind-blowing true crimes, from the heist of the century to TV bombs, mafia vendetta, drug smuggling, gangster assassination, and even a fake currency exchange office run by the feds.
Discover unresolved true-crime cold-case in crime scenes and a police station that only becomes more and more surreal as the story progresses.
Use an array of investigative tools to elaborate your theories on unresolved true-crime cold cases and share them with fellow crime crazies.
But beware of what you may find... Maybe this is not a game, but rather a gateway into a real-life rabbit hole.

name: Little Wizard Sally
description: Little Wizard Sally is a Retro Magical RPG game.

name: Pixel Push Football
description:
Pixel Push Football is an arcade game with physics driven gameplay based on the rules of paper football.

All movement is 100% controlled by a physics system meaning each shot is based on your skill and your skill alone. Super fast gameplay means average game length is less than 15 minutes. Touchbacks, Safeties, Touchdowns, Field Goals, Extra Points, 2 Point Conversions, it's all in the game.

Dynamic AI driven solely by the physics system means no two games are ever the same vs the CPU. 3 difficulty levels to choose from.

Innovative two player mechanic where each player sits across from one another and takes turns attempting to score. Think "old school arcade". Great on larger screens like tablets.

Supports 1-6 human players. Single elimination bracket, progress can be saved and resumed.

name: Viva la Toast
description:
Catch as many toasts as you can! Unlock new characters and crack the high score! Just touch the screen to change direction. But be careful, there are other objects falling from the sky that don't belong in a toaster.
How many toast can you catch?

name: Football Showdown 2
description:
Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone in the world in a head-to-head Football Showdown!
Join a division and battle for supremacy in online tournaments, or compete in single player seasons as your favorite team.
Timing, intuition, reflexes, and pure skill. Control every aspect of your game with the revolutionary PhysKick engine.
All new Boosts! Use 'em wisely to refine your next play, or steal them from your opponent to get a leg up!
Hyper-realistic graphics and heart pounding multiplayer action drop you right on the gridiron.

name: GameKid
description: The Notebook city princess has been kidnapped by the evil Scribble King and it's up to Androkid to save her with the help of the magical fairy. Watch out for Scribble Kings guards because they will make you sad if they catch you. Use confetti bombs to help you on your adventure. Collect all the gold coins to open up the magical door to proceed to the next level. 20 levels in all with some surprises along the way...

name: Eisen
description: Eisen is a MechSimulator that allows you to pilot a massive Mech! You start by entering a heavy iron box and activating your mech. To destory the enemy Mechs, not only piloting skills but also mech upgrades are important strategic elements. It is up to you to decide which armament to upgrade and how. Destroy the oncoming enemies with a variety of armaments.

name: A Cop Chase
description:
A group of thieves have successfully escaped from the central jail with loads of gold coins. police forces are after them. Drag the car up and down to catch the thief's car as well as some coins which toppled on the road from the car window.
To enhance the consistency police car can be upgraded hurry up friends! catch the thieves as soon as possible else your peace will be in danger.

name: Beecarbonize
description: Research cutting-edge technologies, enact policies, protect ecosystems, and modernize industry to cut down carbon emissions. Manage your resources well and you might survive.

name: Hunted By Monsters: Haunting In The Castle Dungeon
description: Run through the halls of the haunted castle! Avoid the monsters! Point and drag to move your character! Survive as long as you can!

name: Pogo Chick
description:
That’s one small step for a chick, one giant leap for birdkind!
Help Pogo reach for the stars in this endless jumper! Make your way through randomized levels and maintain your balance as long as you can. Gravity has never been so overrated!

name: Winning Post 10
description: The latest in the horse racing simulation series Winning Post, celebrating its 30th anniversary!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Randomizer
description:
This Randomizer will randomize items you will find in chests and be given by NPCs. Randomized enemy drops are included too. Additionally, warping via both the Sheikah Slate as well as going inside and outside of shrines has the chance of getting randomized too.

It was taken down from GameBanana by request from Nintendo of America.

name: Lust Theory 2
description: Lust Theory 2 is an adult Visual Novel filled with lust, passion, sex, humor, mystery and on top of that the day is repeating until it doesn't.

name: FPS War 2
description: In this game, you have an arsenal of guns that must be unlocked while you're accomplishing missions. Your objective is simple: after you stole all laptops with essential informations in the previous game, now your aim is to steal all ammunitions and bombs you can!

name: Dungeon Hunter Survival
description: Dungeon hunter survival a game that offers you hours of fun. DHS combines strategy, RPG and Rouge like game stages to extend the your enjoyment.

name: QQTang
description:
QQtang is the best known game in China and across Asia. Not many of you heard of the game "bomberman", which is rarely known in the world . If you heard of bomberman you may think it is so-called "twin" base on the fundamental gameplay by strategically placing bombs in order to kill enemies and destroy obstacles, destroy powerups. However the comparision differs alot especially the clear view of preciseness of the game, designs, qualities, features, events, courses, characters, advantures, cool custom items, designs, and much more.

This game allure to alot of people, It is easy to understand even if the language is foreign to you. You will develop and learn techniques for your goal is to defeat your opponent(s). Additionally, playing with alliance, or if you are comfortable without having team you can play sole, it is optional, doesn't mean they wont get teams.Rank up and you will see amazing unique badges as you continue to go higher(changes in every rank) . Show off your character(s) design (some require money), and many other more.

To start of, choose a server, pick an event,boss..Join the room that you like (platform/arena) or create a your own room to be the leader to pick whatever platform/arena you want to choose and you can mange players (8,7,6,5,4,3, or 2 players), pick varies colors for different team players(you can play with a team or without a team),you can kickout players, whatever you like before you start the game. it is like democracy

name: Mukbang 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Whiteout Survival
description:
Whiteout Survival is a survival strategy game to center on a glacial apocalypse theme. Fascinating mechanics and intricate details await you to explore!

The catastrophic decline in global temperatures has wreaked havoc on human society. Those who have made it out of their crumbling homes are now faced with a new set of challenges: vicious blizzards, ferocious beasts, and opportunistic bandits looking to prey on their despair.

As the head of the last city in these icy wastes, you are the only hope for humanity's continued existence. Can you successfully guide the survivors through the ordeal of adapting to the hostile environment and re-establishing civilization? The time for you to rise to the occasion is now!

name: Tower of Winter
description: For decades, the harsh winter persists, forcing people to rely on a blend of magic and steam technology to survive. However, their plight is becoming increasingly desperate. The source of the endless winter is rumored to reside within a tower at the northernmost point of the continent.

name: 99 Dead Pirates
description: Incredible action, advanced combat system and merciless enemies await you in a terrible dream of a Pirate Captain. Become a real warrior and discover the secrets of the damned frigate.

name: Dynasty Legends: Warriors Unite
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper Hostess
description: Sin descripción

name: SoulCast
description: SoulCast is an online action RPG set in a dark and gritty fantasy world where players compete or cooperate with each other to defeat bosses, enemy factions and other players in intense multiplayer clashes.

name: Alaskan Malamute G.C.
description: Sin descripción

name: Europa Universalis IV: Domination
description: Revisit some of the most powerful and popular nations in EUIV Domination. This Expansion Pack offers new mission trees, new government reforms, new estate management and new events for several of the major powers in the game.

name: The Lamplighters League
description: Sneak, steal, and shoot your way through a world of pulp adventure in The Lamplighters League! Globetrot across a variety of exciting locales around the world and outwit your enemies in strategic turn-based combat - and, if you play your cards right, you might just save the world.

name: Crusader Kings III: Tours and Tournaments
description:
Life is a journey of chivalric adventure, so why don’t you embrace yours, ruler? Create your very own epic story with the major expansion, Crusader Kings III: Tours & Tournaments. Be awed by the sights and events that await you, from bold, mock combat in the jousting area to adventuring perilous wilds with your royal entourage.

Let wanderlust overtake your ruler’s desires during a monumental Tour, and seek out your subjects in a realm that can be both dangerous and richly entertaining. Prove yourself in one of the many forms of gallant Tournaments, either abroad or at home, or use the festivities to murder a quarrelsome rival. Be the host of new Grand Activities, be it grand weddings or stirring falconry hunts. But beware! Many celebrations are the perfect cover for the perfect scheme against foes… or family.

Be the host of new Grand Activities, be it grand weddings or stirring falconry hunts. But beware! Many celebrations are the perfect cover for the perfect scheme against foes… or family.

name: Across the Obelisk: The Wolf Wars
description: Travel back ten years and live the tale of the legendary Wolf Wars seen through the eyes of Magnus and Yogger with this new Story Pack, and unlock a new character, pet and new skins along the way.

name: Mechabellum
description: Mechabellum is an epic auto-battler taking place on the newly colonized planet of Far-Away. You’re the Commander of an army of mechs fighting it out in massive PvP battles. Customize and level up your units, strategically place them on the battlefield and watch them destroy your enemies.

name: Knights of Pen & Paper 3
description: Enter the new and improved world of chivalry, class warfare and off-beat pop references. Knights of Pen & Paper 3 is a true sequel to the turn-based, retro style, pixel-art adventure full of danger and saving throws you hold so dear!

name: Life by You
description: Designed to be one of the most moddable and open life-simulation games, we look forward to the humans, stories, and creations that you’ll make with Life by You.

name: Victoria 3: Update 1.2
description:
Update 1.2 comes with the following updates:

- New Features
- Improvements and bug fixes
- Interface

name: Surviving the Aftermath: Rebirth
description: For the longest time, you strived to survive the aftermath on planet Earth. Now, thanks to your knowledge, skills, and leadership, you can finally look forward to a new chapter for humankind. “Rebirth” is your mantra, your goal, the dream that will make you overcome old and new challenges, for your survivors and all humanity.

name: Cities: Skylines II
description: Create and manage your own city without restrictions. Offering a deep simulation and a living economy, Cities: Skylines II will challenge your decision-making skills and allow you to build the cities of your dreams. Get ready for a new epic scale in the most realistic city builder - ever.

name: V-Master Cross
description: V-Master Cross is an isometric turn-based RPG released only in Japan. The main hero is a young boy who was transported into a weird magic world. The gameplay is based on a special card fight - the battlefield is divided into squares (5 fields for each player), on which the player can summon monsters from a specific deck of cards, with some that can only be placed on a specific field. Each summoned monster has its own look and stats.

name: Cities: Skylines - World Tour Bundle
description: Get inspired by different regions around the world with Cities: Skylines “World Tour”. It includes 2 content creator packs and 2 radio stations: Content Creator Pack: Heart of Korea, Content Creator Pack: Skyscrapers, K-pop Station, 80's Downtown Beat.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 9
description: Chests of Fortune, Skulls of Destiny, World Events better scaling to crew size, more regular Meg and Kraken encounters, fresh cosmetics, a wave of quality-of-life tweaks and much more will breathe new life into your Voyages in Sea of Thieves Season Nine!

name: FireForce Online
description:
War in a modern battlefield combat in this FPS shooter multiplayer online

FireForce Online is a free modern war combat FPS shooter online. The crossfire of the battlefield awaits you!

Are you ready to be an elite soldier? Do you have the cold blood of a true sharpshooter in combat? Then this is the FPS game for you. Fight with your friends online in the battlefield against global paramilitary organizations, show who is the best shooter and make your name as a recognized marksman.

name: Cinnamoroll: Ohanashi Shiyo!: Kirakira de Kore Cafe
description:
Cinnamoroll: Ohanashi shiyo! - Kira Kira DE core Cafe is a Japanese Nintendo DS game released in 2006; developed and produced by Namco Bandai Games Inc..
In this japanese-only game you control Cinnamoroll per touchscreen and microphone.
You walk around the town and complete various errands to run a café.

name: TimeWarp
description:
TimeWarp is a Xash-powered standalone cartoony HL1 total conversion mod set somewhere in the future where time travel became possible.

Play as Patient #84, a prisoner of the Advanced Engineering Corporation (AEC), on a quest to put its entire facility out of commission with the help of a mainframe AI gone rogue, while travelling through time along the way.

name: Payday: The Heist - No Mercy
description: No Mercy is a heist that takes place in Mercy Hospital, a location from the Left 4 Dead game series.

name: Grand Strokers
description: Comedic Horror RPG / JRPG that will leave you breathless with a sticky keyboard --- or offended! No holds barred, no filters. Pure unadulterated sexiness monster orgy goodness!! Features color tiers gear, a ton of monsters and enemies, multiple dungeons and even bosses you can recruit as characters!!

name: Dai-2-ji Super Robot Taisen
description: A remake of 2nd Super Robots Wars released first in Super Robot Wars Complete Box, which was later released as a standalone title.

name: Dai-3-ji Super Robot Taisen
description: A remake of Dai-3-ji Super Robot Taisen for the PlayStation, released first in Super Robot Taisen Complete Box.

name: Clockwork Manor
description:
Venture into the clockwork manor, a mysterious place that seems to know your deepest desires. Do daily tasks as the manor's new maid, while the manor impedes you at every step!
This is an 18+ game made for the Strawberry Jam 7 game jam. In particular, it has elements of hypnosis, reality shifting, and transformation.

name: Super Robot Taisen EX
description: A remake of Super Robot Taisen EX released first in Super Robot Wars Complete Box. It was later released as a standalone title.

name: Super Robot Taisen
description: A remake of the first Super Robots Wars game.

name: Super Robot Wars IV Scramble
description: Port of Dai-4-ji Super Robots Taisen.

name: Burger Memory Game
description:
A new way to train your brain with memory games. This time the challenge is to remember a picture list and not their position. First, you memorize all the images of fast food and then you match the cards in your kitchen. A fun game to help improve the concentration of children and adults.
The game is easy at first, but the difficulty increases with time as the customer will order more meals in your restaurant. The ingredients are chosen randomly, so you will get a new list for each new game even if you choose to play constantly at the same level.

name: Forest Defenders
description:
Forest Defenders is a 3D Tower Defense game base on an untold story...
Once upon a time, on a barren planet, a huge asteroid fell from the sky, exploded and then pieces of magic crystal covered the ground. After that, at the place where the asteroid exploded, a strange giant tree appeared and grew up, became the Mother Tree. That tree used the energy of the crystal, spread life to whole the planet. Not only that, the tree also brought magical power to species, and transformed them into magical Elves. The land around the Mother Tree, where the most energy was concentrated, grew up a lively forest, the Lucy Forest, with the most powerful Elves lived there.
After a long time, human appeared, they created kingdoms, they used crystals to serve their life, they made wars to each other to scramble these powers.
Next to Lucy Forest is the kingdom of Apotan, ruled by the Greedy King. By the inciting of the evil wizard, the King of Apotan ordered his soldiers to come to Lucy Forest, forced to rob the ancient tree, in order to control the great power of the crystal.
Now, the Forest Elves must unite to protect the Mother Tree, against the legion of greedy humans who want to plunder the forest's life force and the green of the land.

name: Angry Gran Global Assault
description: Angry Gran goes Global on this whirlwind Global Assault.

name: Dinosaur Multiplayer
description:
Use your special attack powers like energy ball, huge fire ball and ice attacks in arctic island and jungles with dinosaur fighting and hunting in battlegrounds. Amazing 3D jurassic environment with dinosaur online simulator game. and become the strongest of the t rex and survive in this simulator In dinosaur games 2018 huge collection of wild dinos like t-rex, tyrannosaur rex, stegosaurus, diplodocus, raptor, Spinosaurus and triceratops etc for ultimate fighting and rampage action.
This RPG sim game based on this summer’s epic action-adventure. Unlock to play some of the most frightful and brutal wild dinosaurs by completing levels and earning scores. These merciless and multiplayer t rex world vicious Jurassic creatures will give you a power in successfully completing more levels and having a thrilling experience. Play with friends in online fighting games and challenge real players to epic dino battles with dinosaur games simulator. Control your own customizable tyrannosaurus rex dinosaur and raptor. Collect all the magic & attack elements by gaining more health and craft your special abilities. Provided the game with high quality graphics and a 3D map to explore the Jurassic open world. Challenge other players in real time dinosaur fighting battle mode. Be the last dinosaur t rex or raptor to survive in the multiple locations. Let’s see how long you can survive and how strong can you be in best of dinosaur simulator games.

name: Monsta Bounce
description: Jump and Survive! Monsta Bounce is an addictive Endless Runner. Survive as long as you can to achieve the greatest distance possible - but beware of enemies that will get in your way!

name: Tricky Horse Jump Racing Game
description: Become a horse rider racer and perform ultimate stunts over hurdles & obstacles in Tricky Horse Jump Racing Game. Step into the stunt arena & run hard, reach for the finish line as you jump over classic jumping hurdles in Horse race and horse show jump 3d simulator. Enjoy horse riding and racing, pick your own beautiful steed and knock down all rival and foes and win the championship in this horse racing. The derby quest 2018 of horse racing has been started.

name: Crossy Traffic: Road Rider
description: How far can you drive?

name: Stay on Line: Line Runner
description: Stay on Line is a 2D line runner game. Try to stay on the line and run as far as you can and beat your friend's high score!

name: Drift Draft Destroy
description: Drift Draft Destroy is a dynamic arcade racing survival game. No leveling, no breaks, no health. Choose your car, drift to turn, draft to catch up, shoot to destroy and win the race. Improve your strategy and use devious tactics to destroy all your opponents and sabotage the race.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Heart of Korea
description: Expand your City with Heart of Korea, a fresh, South Korean-inspired Content Creator Pack by Content Creator Elvis. Explore new cityscapes and get inspired by 60 new assets!

name: Payday: The Heist - Undercover
description: The Crew must take an IRS employee, only known as Mr. Sturr, or simply, the Taxman, hostage in order to hack into the IRS and steal $25,000,000.

name: Payday: The Heist - Counterfeit
description: Two businessmen, named Mitchell and Wilson, have a money counterfeiting setup beneath their suburban homes, which generates millions of dollars for the two and their families. The goal of the heist is to rob the two of the money plates they use to create their counterfeit money.

name: Payday: Wolf Pack
description: PAYDAY: Wolf Pack is a bundle of PAYDAY: The Heist DLCs and PAYDAY 2: The Wolf Pack

name: Felix the Cat
description: A Game Boy port of Felix the Cat.

name: Felix the Cat's Giant Electronic Comic Book
description: A cancelled CD-i port of Felix the Cat's Giant Electronic Comic Book.

name: Pokémon 3D
description:
Old school Pokémon in a 3D world! Bringing the games from the early generation of Pokémon games to the modern era.

Pokémon 3D is a video game originally created by Nilllzz. It is heavily inspired by Minecraft, and the Pokémon series. Pokémon 3D focuses on the strong points of Pokémon Gold and Silver versions and their remakes, and gives players a taste as to how the once 2D world they knew was in 3D. They could even see through the eyes of their trainer.

Pokémon 3D focuses on the strong points of Pokémon Gold and Silver versions and their remakes, and gives players a taste as to how the once 2D world they knew was in 3D. They could even see through the eyes of their trainer.

name: Neon Blast
description: Neon Blast is a head-scratching puzzle game.

name: Block Bros.
description: Looking for Mario Maker on iPhone/Android? Block Bros. is a challenging online action game with features more of everything you love! Jump, climb, kick and dash through the ever-expanding selection of levels! Stages can be created by YOU or your fellow players to showcase a tremendous variety in design and difficulty!

name: Lonewolf: Zombie FPS 3D
description: In this game, you can kill waves of zombies in three different maps with a full arsenal. Lots of blood in contrast with dark maps, dimly lit, that requires you luck and skill! Have fun levelling up, unlocking new guns, maps, perks and earning cool emblems!

name: Disney Infinity 4.0
description:
Disney Infinity 4.0 was to be an action-adventure sandbox game developed by Avalanche Software and published by Disney Interactive.

It was the planned sequel to Disney Infinity 3.0, and was initially slated for release in 2017, before it was announced in May 2016 that Disney was ending production of the Disney Infinity series, and the game was cancelled.

name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
description: A Wii port of Batman: Arkham Asylum developed by Red Fly Studio that was cancelled during early development.

name: My Life Coach
description: My Life Coach is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Ubisoft, which was cancelled before it was released.

name: One True Waifu
description: Match and destroy pairs of heathen waifus until you find her — The one! Nothing will stop you from reconnecting with your true waifu.

name: Noroi E: The Origin of Nightmares
description: You will have to make important decisions that will affect the outcome of the game and the fate of the main character. Will you be able to find a way to stop the curse and save yourself from the darkness, or will you fall victim to the darkness and join the ranks of the dead?

name: I Wanna Be The SuperTux
description: I Wanna Be The SuperTux is a level mod for SuperTux that is inspired by I Wanna Be The Guy.

name: I Wanna Be The SuperTux 2
description: I Wanna Be The SuperTux 2 is the sequel to I Wanna Be The SuperTux, a SuperTux mod themed around I Wanna Be The Guy.

name: Fortnite: Marvel - Royalty & Warriors
description: Warriors can be formed for any reason, whether it be a king's responsibility, a soldier's duty or a hired gun's price.

name: Core Fault
description: Control a remote operated mining droid to mine the planet's most valuable resource: Cores. But, beware - the inhabitants don't take too lightly to their home being excavated. Use crank operated movement to weave around enemies, collect Cores, and dig deeper into the fault.

name: Forspoken: In Tanta We Trust
description: Continuing her search for a way to eradicate the Break from Athia once and for all, Frey finds herself following a mysterious voice that leads her to a place that somehow transports her to the Purge of the Rheddig, the legendary battle that devastated Athia and eventually drove the Tantas to madness.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Conqueror Mission, Weapon and Skin Pack
description: Conqueror, the thrilling new mission for Sniper Elite 5, takes you to the town of Falaise as the retreating Nazi forces have dug in to make their last stand at the iconic castle, once occupied by William the Conqueror. You will have to use all of your stealth and skill to slip through the heavily defended Nazi lines, before breaching the castle walls to assassinate the General inside, allowing the Allies to claim victory.

name: Virtues
description: Virtues is an adult visual novel and harem simulator. You, as a young capable college rich kid, versus 7 gorgeous girls with different backgrounds and personalities. Try to immerse yourself in the plots, discover more of the girls, and enjoy the feeling of developing your harem.​

name: Deviant Anomalies
description: Deviant Anomalies is an adult visual novel and investigator simulator. It features High quality renders with fully animated lewd scenes and immersive gameplay. Solve baffling cases, recruit Supernatural Anomalies into your team and help them control their newfound powers. The more uninhibited their minds are, the more their powers grow.

name: Payday 2: Hostile Takeover Heist
description: Hostile Takeover Heist is available on its own or as part of the Hostile Takeover Bundle.

name: Payday 2: Lost in Transit Heist
description: The Lost in Transit Heist is available on its own or as part of the Lost in Transit Bundle.

name: The Awakening
description: The Awakening is a choice-driven adult visual novel with sandbox elements. You as the player are in recovery for amnesia and must navigate your new world with the help of your otherworldly sidekick.

name: Weird Shit is Going to Happen
description: Weird Shit Is Going to Happen is an adult visual novel where weird shit is going to happen. The game is built around a lot of little side stories. As you are exploring these unusual stories, you will try to build a Harem with girls you meet in these side stories.

name: Baking with Lizzie
description: Sin descripción

name: Emoto
description: Twitch Emotes Guessing Game.

name: Payday 2: Midland Ranch Heist
description: The Payday Gang head to Texas to complete a job for Gemma McShay.

name: Moth House
description: Moth House is a collectible horror game that is an adventure game in an old house where many varieties of moths dine, which you will catch. The house is very dark and all you find in your pockets is a box of matches, with which you can light your way a little.

name: Carve Jr.
description: Hit the slopes like never before in the all new Carve Jr! This pint sized prequel packs a punch! Use the crank to perform pinpoint accurate, death defying, nonstop gnar action. Chain tricks together to fight your way up the leaderboard and prove your salt. Just don’t let those pesky trees, rocks, and narc skiers be a buzzkill!

name: Swap Machina
description: Help PD the robot supervisor defrag the mainframe before it's too late in this fast-paced puzzle game made in the Pulp game engine. Inspired by classic 90's block-based action puzzlers Panel de Pon and Tetris Attack, arcade game fans are sure to enjoy Swap Machina. You can compete with your friends' high scores online and locally using the leaderboard feature.

name: Grand Tour Legends
description: Grand Tour Legends is a crank-operated arcade racing game. Spin those pedals and battle 19 other riders across the tour. Experience the thrill of hurtling down the alpine countryside after an exhausting climb. Feel the ocean breeze as you sweep along the coastline. Work out the perfect strategy on each track, save energy to crank it when you need it!

name: The Botanist
description: Follow the Botanist as they travel through space, searching planets for the rare plants needed to solve the food shortage back home.

name: Kingdom of Explorers
description: Kingdom of Explorers is an adventure RPG game for up to 2 players. Each player needs to explore, collect, manage shared resources to unlock new terrains, upgrade weapons to defeat the enemies, Bosses and save the Dwarves Hidden Island!

name: Hidey Spot
description: There are presents hidden around the house. Who can wait for Christmas morning to open them all? Sneak around in the middle of the night and find the goodies before your family wakes up. And who knows—maybe it'll turn out there's something else for you to discover in the home you thought you knew so well…

name: Word Trip
