description: Word Trip is a light-action word-building game with three levels of difficulty, daily challenges, and a stress-free free play mode. Includes online leaderboards! The goal of the game is to get from the top word to the bottom one by making new four letter words.

name: Ezamur
description: Ezamur is a challenging platformer that consists of 4 stages each with it's own set of gimmicks and unique boss fights.

name: Indiepocalypse #1
description: Issue #1 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Payday 2: Black Cat Heist
description: The Payday Gang goes out to sea to strike a blow at the Golden Dagger Triad where it’ll hurt them the most, their floating casino fortress.

name: Tapeworm Disco Puzzle
description: Tapeworm puzzle disco is a grid based puzzle game where you play as a tapeworm; the local night club owner. It's your job to make sure the fleas enjoy themselves. You'll be helping them collect blood, play bangin tunes and get them to gigs on time.

name: Datiddle
description: A Wordle clone using data and analytics terms.

name: The Last Grape
description: The Last Grape is a game about fruits, vegetables and vengeance. Slice through your enemies with speed and precision in this action, fast paced platform where you control a tiny grape in seek for revenge.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - The Whispered Dreams
description: Unlock exciting side cases that expand the world of The Awakened beyond the main adventure. Enjoy new stories, mysteries, and investigations, sure to satisfy your hunger for more detective work. You will need all of your investigative skills to unravel these baffling mysteries, and uncover the extraordinary truths behind them.

name: Tamarak Trail
description: In this deck-building roguelike, you'll use a customizable dice set as you battle through randomly generated trails - full of loot, mysteries, and danger to protect inhabitants from the evil that has corrupted the trail.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition Includes:
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened
- Exclusive Pre-Launch DLC - The Sleuth's Attire (3 costumes)
- Set of digital wallpapers
- The Whispered Dreams Side Quest Pack

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - Premium Edition
description:
The Premium Edition Includes:
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened
- Exclusive Pre-Launch DLC - The Sleuth's Attire (3 costumes)
- Set of digital wallpapers
- The Whispered Dreams Side Quest Pack
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened Soundtrack
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened Artbook

name: Nicktoons: Attack of the Toybots
description: The GBA version of Attack of the Toybots is a 2D platformer with light shooter and puzzle elements.

name: Before the Green Moon
description: Before the Green Moon is a farming / life simulation game set in a unique science fiction world. Explore a small community at the base of a space elevator during the days and seasons leading up to your departure for the moon.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Classic World 1-1
description: Classic World 1-1 is an e-Reader level for Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It is a remake of the first level (1-1) from Super Mario Bros. Its difficulty rating is of one star out of five. This card was released as series one in North America.

description: Classic World 1-4 is an e-Reader level for Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. Its official difficulty rating is of two out of five stars. It is a recreation of the level 1-4 from Super Mario Bros.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Classic World 2-2
description: Classic World 2-2 is an e-Reader level for Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. This card was released in Series 2 in Japan. Its official difficulty rating is of two out of five. It is a remake of level 2-2 from Super Mario Bros.

Its official difficulty rating is of two out of five stars. This card was released as part of series one in Japan and series two in North America.

description: Doors o' Plenty is an e-Reader level for Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. The level contains five Advance Coins and the Super Leaf e-Coin. Its official difficulty rating is of four out of five stars. This card was released as part of series 1 in Japan and North America.

description: Communicate with Mamegoma through words and touch! You become a foster parent for Mamegoma and raise it for one year by feeding it, cleaning it, and teaching it language. They will respond to calls and show you various expressions. 16 + 6 new types Mamegoma are included! You can take pictures in the game and exchange them with your friends!

description: Sin descripción

description: This Card Level for Super Mario Advance 4 is promotional, therefore it was not released in any Card Series.

description: This Card Level for Super Mario Advance 4 is promotional, therefore it was not released in any Card Series.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Treacherous Halls
description: This promotional Card Level for Super Mario Advance 4 is promotional, therefore it was not released in any Card Series.

name: Milkblood
description: Milkblood is a tiny game about dying a lot and making a huge mess.

name: Mamegoma 2: Uchi no Ko ga Ichiban!
description:
This time, a very cute “Baby Mamegoma” is newly introduced! In addition, you will be able to keep two animals at the same time, so you can enjoy watching the Mamegoma parent and child playing together. In addition, "Mamegoma", which swims smoothly in the water, will be unveiled for the first time! The sight of Mamegoma, which is relaxing on the ground, swimming around freely is a moving sight! Daily care such as feeding and cleaning is very easy! If you teach it words, it will show you various poses! There are a total of 32 types of Mamegoma that appear in the game!

Why don't you grow your favorite Mamegoma?

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Series 2
description:
Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e is an expansion pack in the form of separate physical cards for the Nintendo e-Reader. The cards could have new levels (Level Cards), items (Power-Up Cards) and demo gameplay from the developers (Demo Cards).

It was released in bundles separated in two series. The North American version has a complete pack of the cards for each series, but has fewer cards available than the Japanese version, which were released in random smaller packs.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Series 1
description:
The Japanese version of the Card-e series of Super Mario Bros. 3 was also released in two series, but they were distributed in trading card game style small packs with random cards.
This version has many more cards than the overseas version.
The Series 1 packs contained all of the Level Cards released in North America except promotional ones and Classic World 1-1, with the addition of the Classic World 1-2 Level Card.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Series 2
description:
The Japanese version of the Card-e series of Super Mario Bros. 3 was also released in two series, but they were distributed in trading card game style small packs with random cards.
This version has many more cards than the overseas version.
Series 2 contains all of the exclusive Japanese Level Cards.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Seaside Resorts
description: Create your own vintage beach resort with this 19th-century-inspired pack by Gèze. Seaside Resorts will add a stylish flair to your city: relive the nostalgic atmosphere from the old resort towns!

name: Neko Rescue Tale
description: Scurry through the seasons in search of your lost feline friend!

name: G-Mode Archives 44: Dragon x Dragon
description:
Training × blending × combat. Explore the field and raise the strongest dragon!

"DRAGON x DRAGON" is an RPG that captures with three elements: training, blending, and combat.

In order to defeat the dark dragon "Genesis" that plunged the world into chaos, the boy "Willow", a descendant of the dragon messenger, grows up with his partner dragon "Kermes".

Choose your favorite field from among the many exploration destinations and set off on an adventure.

The items that can be acquired depending on the field and the attributes of the wild dragon you live in are different, so let's go deep into the field while consulting with the remaining physical strength of "Kermes" and the items you have on hand.

The young "Kermes" returns to "1" every time you return from the search destination, but you can strengthen your basic ability by mixing the items you got in the middle of the search and giving them to "Kermes".

The effect varies depending on the material to be blended. Try a wide variety of combinations and raise them to be the strongest dragon.

name: The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story - Deluxe Edition
description: The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story Deluxe Edition includes the Silverwing Supply Station Pack, the Home Sweet Cave Pack, the Hijacked Spells Pack, and the Unchained Skins Pack.

name: Mamegoma 3: Kawaii ga Ippai!
description: This time, a total of 50 types of Mamegoma, including 10 new ones, will appear, and you can raise up to 8 Mamegoma at the same time in the spacious "Clover Square". When the player gives a signal, the Mamegoma will gather and show cute reactions such as eating, singing, and playing. In addition, Ojamamedori & Funchama, original game characters drawn by the original author, Mayumi Yonemura, will appear for the first time. If Mamegoma accidentally touches it, it will either laugh or cry and stop growing. There are 18 types of crops that can be grown, including green soybeans, sweet potatoes, strawberries, and bananas. If you take good care of it and harvest it every day, Mamegoma will happily eat it.

name: Someday You'll Return: Director's Cut
description: How far would you go if your daughter didn’t come home? Someday You’ll Return: Director’s Cut is a first-person psychological horror. This story-driven game offers enhanced features, an improved story, and additional content. Enter the woods if you dare and begin a search you’ll never forget.

name: A Doodle Fly
description: Sin descripción

name: Quick Fire
description: The all new fast-paced minigame collection with over 50+ minigames. The more you play, the fast it gets.

name: Fruit Warrior AR
description:
Ever felt like a fighter, a samurai, or even a warrior?
Ever wanted to bash and smash fruits as if there was no tomorrow?
You don't like unrealistic looking stuff?
Then this game is right for you!

name: Attorney of the Arcane
description: Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane is an interactive murder mystery. You play as a defense attorney who practices law in a world of fantasy and wizards. You must defend clients accused of various crimes committed using magic and use the rules of magic to prove them innocent. However, the system is corrupt to its core and manipulated by the aristocracy. Will you acquit your innocent clients in light of that? Or will you fall before a corrupt judicial system?

name: Nox: Escape Adventure
description:
Nox takes you to an old, mysterious mansion filled with secrets waiting to be revealed by you. Accompanied by an exciting story, you explore mysterious rooms and discover their hidden mechanisms. Keep a cool head and do not get fooled - each room hides far more secrets than you can tell at first glance! Whether it's your first escape game or you’re a seasoned adventurer, the varied puzzles will hook you!
STORY: Your puzzle progression is accompanied by an exciting story!

name: MinMe
description: MinMe is a simple puzzle game, in which our hero (you), must strategically collapse tiles and clear a progression of levels. If you enjoy the initial 15 levels, the you can buy the remaining 45 levels. This game is easy for anybody to enjoy, yet will challenge even the most sharp-witted solvers of puzzles.

name: Dots of War
description: Dots of War is an addictive and competitive puzzle game (based on dots and boxes or Timbiriche) in which you have to connect points with lines to gain ground against your opponent.

name: Jetpack Dragon Hunting
description:
Do you usually think of dragons as a legend confined to medieval times? Think again. In this addicting iPhone game, Jetpack Dragon Hunting, the dragons have re-emerged in a futuristic city-world and have one again become a threat to humanity.
But all is not lost. To keep the threat at bay, the humans now employ dragon hunters in jetpacks, sending them out to hunt the flying reptiles and keep their numbers at bay. Ready to join the hunt?

name: Full Contact Teams Racing
description:
Taking dirt oval racing to the next level! Does smashing your way to victory in high powered dirt racing cars in a team situation sound like fun to you? Then you've come to the right place.
Using Demolition Derby Cars & purpose built Superstocks, race in teams of 4 and beat the opposition team to the finish line. The object of the game is get your team across the line first, taking out your opponents team in the process.

name: Windsquire: Race From Dragon Castle
description: A knight gambles away his entire fortune and goes on an epic quest with his squire to amass treasure. Upon discovering and climbing a mysterious castle tower, the cowardly knight pushes the squire down the turret, plunging the squire to the bottom where he lands on a pile of treasure and mystic runes. The magic runes infuse the squire with the ability to control the wind, helping the squire escape the dragon which he has awoken...

name: Jetpack Soccer
description: Jetpack Soccer is a game that will test your jetpack flying skills and reaction times!

name: Jim's Gym
description:
Help Jim in his daily exercises. Control the bench flight by tapping the screen, so that Jim is able to bounce.
The rules are simple, but still demanding.

name: Transworld Endless Skater
description:
Flip, Grab, and Grind your way to the longest runs and highest scores in Transworld Endless Skater!
Choose from five top pro skaters, each with unique skills, trick lists, and goals, as you play toward getting them on the cover of Transworld Skateboarding Magazine!
Endless levels challenge you with an ALL NEW endless way to play - Target Score! Pile up as many points as you can, hitting score targets to add extra time on the clock! How long can you last?

name: Tiny Touchdown
description: Tackle offensive players to stop them from reaching the touchline whilst avoiding flying water bottles.

name: Soccer Moves
description: Outsmart defenders with your clever moves and become the ultimate soccer legend!

name: Bus Simulator 3D
description:
Amazing hill climb bus simulator game.It's time to drive big buses.
We believe it is time to drive a realistic bus with this free simulator in an amazing 3D World. This beast is so powerful and hard to handle. If you want, you can travel the world freely or you can go on duty and collect customers in this massive world. Bring your inner bus driver out, challenge against time, collect passengers, discover new places and enjoy the view.
Don't forget to speed down on cornering on roads.

name: Penalty Shooters Footy
description: It's time for some penalty shootout, most nervy part of any football game. The stadium is full, and you can feel the pressure of the crowd while you concentrate. Is it going to be a goal or not? Are you calm and skillful enough to kick your team all the way to the finals? Check out this great, spiced with humor, football game.

name: Biohazard Village: Z Version - Winters' Expansion
description: Sin descripción

name: Truck Driver: French Paint Jobs
description: Sin descripción

name: Truck Driver: German Paint Jobs
description: Sin descripción

name: Truck Driver: UK Paint Jobs
description: Sin descripción

name: Truck Driver: USA Paint Jobs
description: Sin descripción

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack
description: Created by incredible members of the Cities: Skylines community, the Content Creator Pack adds a series of new buildings to your town -- unique structures, service buildings, and new residential & commercial styles will give your city a brand-new feel!

name: Pow 2
description: Pow 2 is an unlicensed NES game featured on the Go Retro! Portable mini gaming console. Pow 2 is simply a clone of the popular online game 2048, and plays the same with three difficulty levels which change the highest block you can match.

name: Arcade Party
description: It is a fun 4-player party game that supports online co-op.

name: Trails of Sunder
description: Trails of Sunder is an upcoming Monster Taming game that is inspired and mixes elements from Magic The Gathering, Pokemon and Dark Souls.

name: WWE 2K23: Cross-Gen Digital Edition
description: WWE 2K23 is Even Stronger with expanded features, gorgeous graphics and a deep roster of WWE Superstars and Legends. 2K Showcase returns as an interactive sports documentary focusing on the 20-year career of John Cena and WarGames is finally here!

name: WWE 2K23: Icon Edition
description:
WWE 2K23 Icon Edition

• 3-Day Early Access

• Ruthless Aggression Pack: Includes throwback versions of John Cena, Randy Orton, Batista, and Brock Lesnar, along with the WrestleMania 22 arena and the John Cena Legacy Championship

• Season Pass: Includes all 5 post-launch DLC character packs, the MyRISE Mega-Boost pack, with 200 additional Attribute Points, and the Supercharger pack which unlocks all base-game WWE Legends and throwback arenas. Release timing of the DLC contents will be revealed at a future date.

• Deluxe Edition Bonus Pack: Includes a John Cena EVO card, Emerald-tier Bianca Belair, and Gold-tier Asuka and Edge cards, plus 3 Basic Day 1 MyFACTION card packs

• Icon Edition Bonus Pack: Includes a Paul Heyman Emerald tier Manager MyFACTION Card and 3 Deluxe Premium Launch MyFACTION Packs.

name: Anno 1800: Console Edition - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes three Cosmetic Packs: Amusements Pack, Pedestrian Zone, and Vibrant Cities.

Welcome to the dawn of the Industrial Age. Experience one of the most exciting and fast-changing periods of all time in a rich city-building experience! Implement your own strategy and build a new world to your design.
Play solo, PvP, or co-op modes.

name: Yoshi, the Web Pet
description: Yoshi, The Web Pet was a Flash game on the Yoshi's Story website. It was a virtual pet game where the user could raise their own pet Yoshi.

name: UFO Robot Grendizer: The Feast of the Wolves - Deluxe Edition
description: For the first time in the video game history, climb aboard Grendizer the Legendary Robot and fight the forces of evil to defend our planet Earth!

name: UFO Robot Grendizer: The Feast of the Wolves - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Grilled Dogs: Grillar - Es Geht Um Die Wurst
description: Grilled Dogs: Grillar - Es Geht Um Die Wurst is a game that was released exclusively in the German Burger King app.

name: Summer BBQ: Grilled Barbeque
description: Summer BBQ: Grilled Barbeque was a game playable in the German Burger King app.

name: Verlängerung: The Game
description: Verlängerung: The Game was a game included in the German Burger King app.

name: Crymachina: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Sing 2023: Double Mic Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou Rinroushou: Eirin Is Going To Get Married
description: Focusing on members of Eientei, the story tells about a new incident happens in the late autumn.

name: Victoria 3: Grand Edition
description:
Get the full experience of Victoria 3 with the Grand Edition, which includes the base game as well as the expansion pass, including:

Melodies for the Masses Music Pack
Dawn of Wonder Art Pack
Voice of the People Immersion Pack
Sphere of Influence Expansion
The Expansion Pass Bonus: The American Building Pack

name: Stellar Dawn
description: A cancelled port of Stellar Dawn for the Panasonic Jungle.

name: Hotel Renovator: Palace Furniture Set
description: This content requires the base game Hotel Renovator on Steam in order to play.Your guests deserve more than just a superb night’s sleep. Elevate the rooms of your Hotel with a 32-item set of prestigious furniture made of sumptuous fabrics and rich colors. Create a heavenly sense of luxury from a unique blend of classic and glamour.

name: Kaizo Mario Bros. 3
description: Kaizo Mario Bros. 3 is a kaizo ROM hack of Super Mario Bros. 3 created by Hunter W.

name: Cities: Skylines - K-pop Station
description:
Get in the groove with some K-pop tunes! Straight from South Korea, K-Pop Station arrives to energize your city-management skills.
K-Pop Station features 16 songs for more than 45 minutes of music!

name: Cities: Skylines - 80's Downtown Beat
description: Feeling the asphalt melting under your feet? Got stuck in a traffic jam? What about stepping on a cramped train? Breathe in the modern City! Put your headphones on and lace up your rollerskates with the 80's Downtown Beat radio.

name: Cities: Skylines - Calm the Mind Radio
description: City-building got you stressed? Tune that dial to Calm the Mind Radio, the second relaxation station in the game, to bring some chill vibes into your architectural workflow.

name: Cities: Skylines - On Air Radio
description: Cool cats rejoice, "On Air Radio" brings jazz beats to Cities: Skylines. Ideal for building the smoothest cities around. Tune in right now!

name: Cities: Skylines - Downtown Radio
description: Kick back and relax to the smoothest tunes in town on Downtown Radio, your one-stop-shop for modern lounge music in Cities: Skylines. This channel features 16 original songs with a retro twist, created especially for all the late-night city builders out there.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Vehicles of the World
description: A set of 21 new vehicle assets from around the globe, brought to you by "bsquiklehausen". Fill the streets of your cities with iconic service vehicles, like a Police Supercar and more!

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Map Pack
description: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Map Pack features 8 new maps by "Sanctum Gamer", where you can unleash your creativity and plan new metropolises.

name: That's My Family: Family Fun Night
description: Family Fun Night is the first game from That's My Family to offer both original board games and classic games that were part of your childhood! Play 14 different games, from Snakes and Ladders to Parcheesi, Chess and 4 in a Row, and many more!

name: Fitness Circuit
description:
10 minutes a day, three days a week.

Fitness Circuit utilizes Super Circuit Training, a workout method that alternates aerobic and strength-building exercises to burn calories efficiently, increase endurance, and improve muscle strength in a short period of time. This method is designed to have a high training effect, so you won’t need to play every day. Complete a standard workout session in just 10 minutes a day, three days a week.

name: Johnny Crash Stuntman: Does Texas
description: Cowboys and cactuses beware! Johnny Crash is having a vacation in Texas. Be a human cannonball and laugh your guts out! Play Johnny Crash Does Texas.

name: Dennis The Menace: Catapult Master
description: Dennis throws objects on passersby people in the classic legacy mobile java game.

name: Superman Batman: Heroes United
description: Team up with two of the world's greatest heroes to fight evil in Superman & Batman: Heroes United. Play as Superman and Batman as you battle through the DC Universe to save the planet from complete annihilation. Choose to play as the Man of Steel to counter opponents with flight, superstrength and heat vision. Select the Dark Knight to stun adversaries with gadgets and martial arts.

name: Ice Age 2: Arctic Slide
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash 'N' Burn Turbo
description: Sin descripción

name: Kung Fu Panda
description: Enjoy fast action fun based on characters and storylines from Kung Fu Panda. Become a Kung Fu Master! Play as Po or Tai Lung.

name: Galaxy Balls
description: Galaxy Balls - the legendary game from the Nokia 2600 and many other models!

name: Beach Rally
description: It's a classic sprite scaling racing game. Auto accelerate means steering left & right to avoid the rival racer cars. Complete 10 sections of track to "win".

name: Cricket Cup
description: The nostalgic cricket game that used to come pre-installed on Nokia legacy phones.

name: Rooms of Doom
description: The most exciting collection of mini games known to Man! Crafted by the evil scientist Dr. Doom.

name: Zombie Survival
description: In this game, you can play two modes: campaign and survival. The campaign mode contains 4 levels, one harder than the other, with varied and challenging enough goals! The survival mode, or "Horde Mode" brings to the players the experience of becoming a survivor of several waves of zombies. In survival mode, the only goal is to kill as many zombies and challenge your friends and family to beat your record!

name: Top Cat: Alley Cash
description: The cats are trying to make a living in the back alley and they just spotted some dirty money laundering operation and they want a cut for it being on their property. jump alternately and collect the notes and become rich. use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to collect notes.

name: Dexter's Lab: Dexter's Bubble Juggle
description: Sin descripción

name: Dexter's Lab: Red Eye Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Snowmobile Rally
description: Super Snowmobile Rally is a crossover Cartoon Network game, with The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy characters featured on it.

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Escape Mission
description: Being a secret operative for the Kids Next Door isn`t easy: it takes constant practice to keep your spy skills sharp. that`s why Numbuh 1 is putting the KND through today's training mission. The objective is to find the best escape route through the Treehouse in as few steps as possible.

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation S.T.A.T.
description: Operation: S.T.A.T. is the ninth game on Cartoon Network website about Kids Next Door. It shows what would happen if adults were taking over Cartoon Network and the KND were calling help from heroes from other Cartoon Network shows.

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation R.A.I.L.
description: Operation: R.A.I.L. (Rapid And Infinite Labyrinth) is a KND game on Cartoon Network website. It revolves around Numbuh 2, saving his friends from the DCFDTL that tied them on a dangerous roller coaster.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Plus
description:
Five Nights at Freddy's Plus, unofficially dubbed as FNAF Plus Restored is an indie point-and-click fangame developed by LostPawPlay, ripped direct from Phisnom's cancelled project Five Nights at Freddy's Plus. The final release of FNAF Plus Restored would release months after the official cancellation of Phisnom's Fazbear Fanverse project Five Nights at Freddy's Plus.

Later development on the game would be stopped due to controversy on the fan game and Five Nights at Freddy's creator, Scott Cawthon.

name: Logic Town
description: Logic Town is a challenging coffee-break puzzle game based on Einstein Puzzles (AKA Zebra Puzzles). Solve the puzzles to redecorate various scenes in a Seaside Town. Each new location unlocks a new puzzle theme!

name: Grim Ball
description: Grim has challenged Mandy to play dodgeball. Help her teach that bag of bones a lesson!

name: My Gym Partner's a Monkey: Hall of the Wild
description: An unknown prankster hid the lunchboxes of every student in school. Adam and Jake volunteer to find them all. However, Bull Sharkowski plans on getting in their way.

name: Marvin the Martian vs. the Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Mike, Lu & Og: Toy Builders
description: Sin descripción

name: Johnny Bravo in the Cherub Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Monkey's Adventures
description:
Monkey's Adventures (Tytus, Romek i A'Tomek) is a platform game in Polish, inspired by the cult comic book by Henryk Chmielewski. The player takes control of the comic's protagonist — Tytus, a talking chimpanzee. One of Tytus's friends, the ingenious inventor Professor T. Alent, needs your help: his robots have gone haywire, and are going wild all over the city.

On each level, the player needs to collect a specific amount of the indicated items (such as candy or coffee cups) and then reach the exit. There are various robotic enemies in the game, which can be defeated by rolling into them, beating them up, or shooting them with weapons collected along the way.

name: Superhook
description: Superhook is a fast paced first person shooter where time only moves when you move. the catch is you can only move by using your grappling hook. zip around levels with your hook while dodging and killing enemies with guns or even punching their own bullets back at them!

name: Powerpuff Girls: Power Surf
description: Sin descripción

name: Cow & Chicken: Christmas in July
description: Sin descripción

name: Turing Quest
description: A party game where up to six players compete against a hilarious AI to write jokes. Using a phone or tablet as a controller, players vote on whether the AI or human players can be more entertaining. The game is designed to be played on a TV, a large monitor, or screen share for remote play.

name: Dexter's Laser Lab
description:
Dexter's Laser Lab is a Shockwave game based on Dexter's Laboratory that was playable on the official Cartoon Network website.

In this game, Dee Dee celebrates her birthday by having a party in Dexter's laboratory, leaving behind many balloons in her wake. Dexter, using his invention called the TidyTron 4000, a high-powered infrared laser, works to get rid of the balloons in his laboratory.

name: Dexter's Labyrinth
description: Dexter's Labyrinth is a Shockwave game that was formerly available on the Cartoon Network website. Sometime later, it was delisted as a free game and added to Cartoon Network's Power Play Games program when it launched in 2003.

name: Planet Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: Wargroove 2
description:
Return to the battlefield, sea, and sky with a cast of new Commanders, using your wits to wage turn-based war! An all-new Wargroove adventure for new recruits & veteran wardogs alike!

Trouble stirs on the shores of Aurania. An ambitious new faction has unearthed forbidden relics capable of catastrophic consequences. But how far will they go to achieve glory? Take to the battlefield, sea, and sky with a cast of new Commanders, using your wits to wage turn-based war!

name: Sleeping Alone
description: Sleeping Alone is a short retro PSX-style indie horror game.

name: Tetris
description: A cancelled version of Tetris for the Windows Mobile Pocket PC.

name: Runescape
description: A port of Runescape for the cancelled Panasonic Jungle handheld.

name: Battlestar Galactica Online
description: A port of Battlestar Galactica Online for the cancelled Panasonic Jungle.

name: Disney Infinity: Toy Box
description: The "Toy Box" mode from Disney Infinity 1.0 as a standalone game on Windows and iOS.

name: Terraria: Fargo's Mod
description: Fargo's Mod is a mod for Terraria that adds a variety of content across all stages of the game, and features cross-compatibility with many other prominent mods. It is split into two main mods: Fargo's Mutant Mod, and Fargo's Soul Mod; with the latter having two small add-ons.

name: Worms v Lemmings
description: Worms v Lemmings is a cancelled game that was in development in 2006, however was cancelled very shortly into development with only a PC prototype being made.

name: Tasmanian Devil
description: Tasmanian Devil is a cancelled SNES game based on the Looney Tunes character of the same name.

name: Happy Camper
description: Happy Camper is an Action game, developed and published by Color Dreams, which was cancelled before it was released.

name: Mario 3 Oasis
description: Mario 3 Oasis is a medium-difficulty, non-kaizo hack, great for streaming and speedrunning.

name: ReCaptcha V4
description: A parody ReCaptcha in which you play chess against an AI to prove you are not a robot.

name: My Summertime Girlfriend
description:
Your grades are plummeting, and it looks like you’re going to be held back a year… That is, until your teacher suggests you try attending summer school. You have nothing else to lose, so why not? You resign yourself to another boring summer, but it turns out the summer school is part of a beach resort full of beautiful girls who all seem excited to get to know you!

The program only runs for a month, but you quickly learn to live alongside your three rambunctious roommates and help them solve their problems. It’s not long before you realize that these girls are interested in more than just a study buddy… Can you handle the heat?

name: Calm Falls
description: Calm Falls is the first released game from Kelven and might be the first german Silent Hill inspired RPG-Maker game.

name: Calm Falls Remaster
description: Calm Falls Remaster is a remastered version of Kelven's first game Calm Falls. The game stays mostly true to the original but changes the battle system and enhanced the graphical presentation.

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3 + Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Expansion Pass
description:
This convenient bundle includes the Xenoblade Chronicles 3 game for the Nintendo Switch system, along with the Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Expansion Pass that offers four waves of downloadable content.

In the Xenoblade Chronicles 3 game, you’ll join Noah and Mio, members of the two opposing nations of Keves and Agnus, on a heartfelt journey to end the cycle of violence. A group of six characters from these nations join together to awaken the colonies of Aionios and expose the true threat both nations face. Traverse massive, fantastical landscapes as you learn how this game connects to the larger Xenoblade Chronicles story.

Command six characters and seamlessly enter real-time, RPG combat: All six of your core party members jump into action against enemies, auto-attacking with their distinct Arts and weapons. Position your team to take advantage of Arts and maximize damage and debuffs. Pairs of characters can Interlink to form a mighty Ouroboros capable of taking down the most threatening enemies with powerful Arts.

In addition to the game, you’ll get the Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Expansion Pass, giving you access to four waves of DLC content as they become available. Kick off your adventure with a boost from the items included in Wave 1, releasing on the game’s launch day—then enjoy three more waves through 2023.

name: Crusader Kings III: Chapter I
description:
Complete your Crusader Kings III grand strategy experience with Crusader Kings III: Chapter I, which includes the game’s first major expansion and two unique flavor packs.

Crusader Kings: Royal Court (expansion)
Crusader Kings: Fate of Iberia (pack)
Crusader Kings: Northern Lords (pack)

The Crusader Kings III: Expansion Pass also gifts the Fashion of the Abbasid Court cosmetic pack.

name: Akiba's Trip: Undead & Undressed - Director's Cut
description: First released in the West in 2014, AKIBA’s TRIP: Undead & Undressed brings the vampire-slaying action-RPG to the Nintendo Switch for the first time as the Director’s Cut. This new edition features all the awesome otaku content from the previous release, including the original game’s DLC, plus an all-new story route focusing on the lovable Finnish maid Kati Räikkönen, complete with all-new voice over in Japanese and English featuring the original cast.

name: Akiba's Trip: Undead & Undressed - Director's Cut: Day 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Velsabor
description:
Velsabor is a game by Lachsen, started in the year 2002 and first released as a demo in 2005. It is classical RPG and is often cited as one of the best German RPG-Maker games ever to be released and won several community awards.
A final demo was released in 2013 before the game got canceled for being to ambitious for an hobby project.

name: Hunt: Showdown: Llorona's Heir
description: Much like the legend whose name she uses, Llorona earned her fearsome reputation by drowning her victims and haunting her enemies. Like a shade, she is fast and subtle, with both gun and knife.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Masyu
description: You won't use any letters or numbers in this original puzzle - the only hints are black circles and white circles. "Masyu" is a puzzle in which you draw a line through the spaces according to the rules. Learn the attributes of the black and white circles and you'll be able to play in no time. The patterns through which lines can be drawn are more numerous than you can imagine, and discovering tactical moves is also fun.

name: Hunt: Showdown: Death's Herald
description:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and two Legendary Weapons:

- Sofia (one hunter)
- Weeping Marigold (one weapon)
- Eye for an Eye (one weapon)

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
description:
Thirty years after Freddy Fazbear's Pizza closed its doors, the events that took place there have become nothing more than a rumor and a childhood memory, but the owners of "Fazbear's Fright: The Horror Attraction" are determined to revive the legend and make the experience as authentic as possible for patrons, going to great lengths to find anything that might have survived decades of neglect and ruin.

At first there were only empty shells, a hand, a hook, an old paper-plate doll, but then a remarkable discovery was made...

The attraction now has one animatronic.

name: Scramballed!
description: Smash your friends in the face with eggs in the ultimate chicken showdown! Control a cast of quirky cluckers and compete in a wacky version of tennis.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Masyu
description: Nikoli's original puzzle using only black and white circles for hints.

name: The Treflik Family
description: Leap into a world of imagination alongside Treflik and his sister Treflinka. Give in to this magical land and see it through their eyes.

name: Arcade Archives: Turbo Force
description: A frantic aerial battle against the fastest, strongest enemies yet!

name: Suuji Puzzle: Game Zutto
description: Sin descripción

name: Fatal Frame: Mask of the Lunar Eclipse - Digital Deluxe Upgrade
description: Sin descripción

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Chokkan! Hirameki Oekaki Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Dassouchuu: Tousou Shita Hannin wo Sagase!
description: Sin descripción

name: Nazotoki Noutore: BrainQuiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Ikisugi!? Before After
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4
description:
In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows. Playing as a child whose role is yet unknown, you must safeguard yourself until 6am by watching the doors, as well as warding off unwanted creatures that may venture into your closet or onto the bed behind you.

You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.

name: Virtual Table Tennis
description: Virtual Table Tennis is the only one based on 3D PHYSICS and supported ONLINE MULTIPLAYER table tennis game in the Google Play.

name: What's it? Flags
description: This is quiz game full of fun that consists on guessing the names of hundreds of flags around the world.

name: Word Cats
description:
A word search game for everyone!
Meow! Make as many words as you can in 30 seconds. Earn cat coins to complete your collection of cats and share your favourite words with your loved ones.

name: Word Monsters
description: Word up, Word Monsters! Play this social word game with your friends and compete with players around the world to see who’s the top monster of them all!

name: Word Twist!
description:
Word Twist! is a fast-paced and dynamic word game. You build words from a limited but changing selections of letters to gain as many points as you can in one minute.
A perfect way to challenge your vocabulary while waiting for the buss or watching a bad TV show.

name: Tim the Timber
description: Destroy all the bricks... Travel all those places... Never let go of that ball. Never let the rain disappoint you... Be careful, please. Do drink your milk, eat healthy... I believe you can fly. Fly when you must.

name: Sushi Factory
description:
Enjoy this super cute sushi puzzle!
Put sushi on a plate to serve your guests and earn money!
Solve puzzles to collect sushi recipes and upgrade to the beautiful interior!

name: Supergun
description:
Whatever you do, avoid the red cubes!
Control your spaceship and your aim to guide your ship safely through space. Your ship moves and shoots automatically, you just control your movements to the left and right.
Collect power-ups and shoot the cubes to increase your score. It might sound easy, but your ship will speed up quickly! Try and beat your high score round after round.

name: Space Racer X
description:
Do you enjoy hustling in space, dodging narrow canyons with a fast x-plane racer?
Space Racer X is endless 3d space flying game simulator.
Collect credits and buy new spaceships that are created only for you.

name: Sky Bouncer
description:
This is Sky Bouncer, collect all the coins to beat your friends in this endless battle to the sky. Use power ups and invincibility to go as high as you can.
Tap left and right on the screen of your device to guide your character through the waves of explosives and killer enemies, and test your reaction speed. See if you can top the leaderboards with the most coins.

name: SolveWithMe
description:
Are you ready for a new Word Search experience?
An incredible puzzle developed in the heart of undiscovered Siberia. Easy-to-use, extremely polished but still simple, this game offers tons of various puzzles. Colors, cars, space ships, pirates, songs, celebrities... I bet you'll lose count of all the themes! Drag lines, use hints, share your scores with 2 most popular social networks ever made.

name: Ultimate Derby Online
description:
Accept the challenge from the most fearless and cool derby-destroyers and become the new Legend of Next-Gen Demolition Derby!
Prove your power and greatness in the most exciting and realistic derby game in the history.

name: 1 Shot Pool
description:
Play a unique pool game like never before.
In a frictionless environment, once in motion, things don't stop!

name: Crossly
description: Challenge your friends in the fun strategic word game that combines classic crosswords with the spirit of friendly competition! In Crossly, two players race to fill the board, earning one point per letter and stealing points from their opponents along the way.

name: Clickbait: Tap to Fish
description:
All it takes to start your cozy angling hobby is a humble hook. Just click or tap to let your inner fisherman take the clickbait and become an angler idol!
Soon you’ll be overseeing automated fishing systems that cast the bait and lure for you. Boat your way to bigger lakes, unlock crazy contraptions, acquire new perks, reel in investments, and finally, let a new generation of fishers carry your legacy to conquer the biggest of lakes!

name: Bunny Boiler
description: Run as far as you can avoiding the lava. Tap the screen to jump. The longer you tap the higher you jump.

name: BoxCar Racing
description:
Start out with the teams paddock bomb and work your way up the team to be our top driver..
Earn new faster and better performance BoxCars as you work your way through mini championship races.

name: Pocket Pugilism
description: Think you have what it takes to take on the best? Welcome to the ultimate boxing challenge. Pocket Pugilism is a game that will test your fighting skills and reaction times!

name: Mu Jiang
description: "Mu Jiang" is a peaceful puzzle.It is free, but high-quality, original, and unique.

name: Highway Racer: Out of Control
description: Sin descripción

name: Hidden Object Vampires Temple
description: Are you looking for wonderful vampire games? Do you want to become a true vampire hunter? Here is an excellent vampire adventure for you! We have created this hidden object game which will entertain you and help you practice vocabulary! If you always loved playing mystery hidden objects, you're at the right place!

name: Hidden Objects Christmas Game
description: Are you looking for Christmas hidden objects games? Christmas countdown 2018 has already begun so get ready to make a Christmas wish! If you wished for hidden object games for Christmas, you're at the right place! Download Hidden Objects Christmas and look for Santa, Snowman, and Christmas gifts in incredible pictures! Merry Christmas!

name: Gnomium: Pocket Edition
description: Play the worlds first 'reactive' word puzzle, with hours of challenging game play (and a very cool flying pickax). This word-game that plays like an arcade game will have you mining and collect ore, coins and precious gems from a magical letter grid in the sky.

name: Gluttony Monster
description:
The monster is hungry again.
At this time he targets on the delicious foods, but it is not easy to eat them.
He has to avoid the traps and bombs, all of which depends on your help.

name: Find Objects in Living Room
description: Welcome to the messy living room! Embark on a hidden object quest such you have never experienced before! We have created an awesome hidden object world where you can play and forget about all your worries! This incredible find the hidden object game will take you to an object finding journey of your life! If you're looking for hidden object adventure games for tablets , our brand new find objects game will bring you off your feet! Download Find Objects in Living Room, get ready for some amazing puzzle solving, and start an excellent brain workout. Enjoy every step of this mystery case in a messy living room!

name: FNaF World
description: After the release of FNaF World on PCs, Scott Cawthon learned that he has been rushing his game releases and that he forced lore into a silly, cute RPG game. When the Android Port released, people quickly realized that this Mobile Port is edited to be more silly and goofy, with the game poking jokes at itself at times.

name: Genius Quiz Poke
description:
Genius Quiz Poke is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Pokémon universe.
The game works as always: 50 questions, and once you miss one, you're back at the beginning.

name: Super Vadimka X
description: Super Vadimka X - a free action video game made by two developers VadimBallzGame and HyperTheLoopa420 for Windows. This is the first Super Vadimka game for 16-bit style and the first game in the Super Vadimka X series, a spin-off of the original Super Vadimka series that started on the predecessor. The Super Vadimka X game was first released in honor of the International Women's Day holiday on March 8, 2023 and was released in Europe and America in the same year. The game takes place after the event 1 month ago, years after the original Super Vadimka, in a beautiful world inhabited by both people and "Monsters", the Evil Super Pupkin decided to somehow take over the world and kill the main character will the main character be able to survive.

name: Every Grocery Store Has One Product That Binds Everything in a Unified Energy
description: A game about the obligations of working in retail.

name: Horizon Heat
description: Dive into the neon world of night rides with a retrowave soundtrack. Earn scores, buy new cars and enjoy great retro music.

name: Return to Sender
description: Dodge in real-time, then tag bullets in slow-mo to shoot them back!

name: Tic Tac Bow
description:
The game is archery tic-tac-toe, where the goal is to alternately shoot arrows and align the targets.
Unlike normal, the player can change the opponent's target by hitting it more centrally.
Selected for the archery category of Olympic eSports Week 2023.

name: Fantasy of Master
description:
Fantasy of Master is a RPG-Maker 2000 game that is considered the prime example of a "trash game" due to it's low quality.
It became somewhat more known due to a Let's Play from TrueMG, which than inspired and spawned a fanmade parody sequel. The official sequel that was announced never released.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Journey Deluxe
description:
The Legend of Zelda: Link's Journey Deluxe is a fan game of The Legend of Zelda by Tropical Bird. It's story line is heavily inspired by Ocarina of Time, with many places being revisited.
The game became somewhat infamous for it's poor quality, due to the fact that it was the first game by the developer.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Triforce Duo
description:
The Legend of Zelda: Triforce Duo is the sequel to Tropical Bird's "The Legend of Zelda: Link's Journey". Despite showing quite some improvements, it is still known for it rather poor quality, like is predecessor.

This game however introduced the mechanic of two playable characters that can be switched between, which is necessary to solve various puzzles.

name: Nicktoons: Attack of the Toybots
description: The DS version of Attack of the Toybots is a sidescroller beat-em-up with light shooter elements.

name: Calm Falls 2
description: Calm Falls 2 is the sequel to Kelven's first game Calm Falls. Despite being set in the same town and using the same title, the story is not directly connected and both can be played as an standalone game.

name: The Golden Girls Take Manhattan DX
description: A cancelled Persona parody featuring The Golden Girls.

name: BallisticNG: Neon Nights
description: Neon Nights introduces 5 new tracks, all playable in forward and reverse, a new campaign covering 48 events and a new set of liveries.

name: Corru.Observer
description: Corru.Observer is a hard sci-fi visual novel, point-and-click adventure about a contractor hired by an intelligence agency to hack into an alien biological computing device dredged up from the bottom of the ocean.

name: Life in Santa County
description: Life in Santa county is an adult visual novel that focuses on you discovering the dark side of your seemingly peaceful town. Featuring fully animated scenes, in game phone with messaging, a point system and custom crafted characters.

name: Alien Wars
description: Alien Wars is a classic space battle action video game filled with waves of enemies and weapon powerups. In this gun game, can you prove that you are a good shot as you shoot up your enemies? Play this hooting game and avoid the dangerous projectile(s)!
